title: Government urges Bangladesh’s universities to close after 6 die in protests
creator: Julhas Alam, The Associated Press
content: DHAKA, Bangladesh (AP) — Authorities in Bangladesh urged all universities to close on Wednesday, after at least six people died in violent protests over the allocation of government jobs. Some universities quickly moved to comply, but others, including Dhaka University at the center of the protests, were still deciding how to respond. The country’s universities are run autonomously and the request from the University Grants Commission did not have legal force. Julhas Alam, The Associated Press

title: Sustainable gastronomy: The new frontier for the Cypriot culinary Industry

Its options are limited, given the primary season is long past and the Aug. 19 convention is only weeks away. But they are worth getting right for this year and future presidential cycles. Suppose Biden endorses Vice President Kamala Harris and asks his delegates to follow his lead. She's vetted, has close relationships across the party...

title: It's too early to be fighting a space race with China
content: China's space program in late June brought back the first rock and soil samples from the mysterious far side of the moon. It was a major triumph. Scientists are eager to use these samples to learn more about the origin of the moon and Earth. At the same time, others are worried China is on the way to winning a new space race for the first permanent base on the moon. China's mission makes it clear that the country sees the moon as a strategic asset, they say, rather than a site for purely...

title: Differentiating criminal from civil matters
creator: Yejide Gbenga-Ogundare
content: The Nigeria legal system addresses the wrongdoings that people commit with two different types of cases: civil and criminal. But many are accused of criminal offences for civil issues because they don’t know the difference. Criminal cases are offences against the state, even if immediate harm is done to an individual. Accordingly, they are prosecuted by the state in a criminal court. But civil cases typically involve disputes between parties regarding the legal duties and responsibilities they...

title: Vaccine for respiratory infection to be rolled out
content: A new vaccine which will protect babies and older adults against a common but potentially dangerous respiratory infection will be rolled out in Wales. Respiratory syncytial virus (RSV) usually causes mild, cold-like symptoms, but can lead to bronchiolitis and pneumonia. More than a thousand babies in Wales are hospitalised every year with the infection. The programme will be offered to pregnant women (from 28 weeks) and those aged 75 to 79 years old. title: Patchell signs for Pivac's Green Rockets
content: Wales fly-half Rhys Patchell has joined NEC Green Rockets Tokatsu in Japan. The 31-year-old spent the 2024 Super Rugby season with Highlanders in New Zealand but will now link up with former Wales head coach Wayne Pivac, who is in charge at Green Rockets. Patchell signed for Highlanders in Dunedin in July 2023 on a one-year deal after being released by Scarlets, becoming the first Welsh player to leave Wales to sign for a Super Rugby side in New Zealand. title: China's Communist Party charts technology- and security-focused development for reviving the economy
content: In a year of major elections that will determine the destinies of many countries, China’s ruling Communist Party is holding closed, top-level meetings in Beijing to set strategies for reviving its slowing economy. State media likened the meetings that end Thursday to reforms started in the late 1970s that opened China's economy to foreign investment and private enterprise. State broadcaster CCTV said the agenda for this year’s meetings is to study and endorse “all-around deepening reforms.”...

title: Mystery surrounds Trump rally shooter despite FBI's deep dive into his shadowy past
creator: Firstpost
content: Three days after the attempted assassination of former President Donald Trump, profile of the 20-year-old shooter, Thomas Matthew Crooks, who was shot dead by police minutes after, remains a complete mystery. Crooks, who nearly killed Trump with a high-velocity bullet, is described as an intelligent but solitary individual with few friends. His limited social media presence and lack of clear political beliefs have provided no evident motive for the attack. Despite the FBI’s extensive...

content: MANILA, Philippines — More than 3.7 million indigent senior citizens across the country received their social pensions from January to June of 2024. title: Babcock: Geopolitical tensions boost FTSE 250 firm’s revenue
creator: Ali Lyon
content: Heightened geopolitical tensions and the ramping up of defence spending across western countries has helped Babcock International to strong increases in organic revenue and underlying profit. The FTSE 250 defence firm, which in March won a bumper £560m contract to refit one of the Royal Navy’s Trident nuclear submarine s, saw its underlying profit jump 34 per cent in the year ended March 31 despite swallowing £90m loss on a major contract with the navy. creator: Ajay Tomar
content: HYDERABAD: Every time it rains in Fakhr-ul Mulk Devdi, Ravindher, a person with disabilities, has to take a different route to reach his home as the usual path is inundated. title: UK weather: Mini heatwave to hit parts of the UK this week
content: After weeks of mixed weather and a lot of rain, it looks like summer is finally here as weather forecasts predict a mini heatwave is on its way. This weekend, parts of the UK will have temperatures rising to as high as 30C. The long-awaited hot weather comes after well above-average rainfall figures in the first half of the month, including a weather warning for rain on Tuesday (July 16) evening. content: UK inflation held steady in June as price rises across the county stayed at the Bank of England’s target level for the second month running, according to official figures. title: UK inflation fails to drop as rate holds steady at Bank of England target
creator: bristolpostnews@localworld.co.uk (Howard Lloyd)
content: UK inflation held steady in June as price rises across the county stayed at the Bank of England’s target level for the second month running, according to official figures. The number remained unchanged at 2 per cent. It means prices in June rose at the same rate as in May, data from the Office for National Statistics showed. title: Manfaat Teknologi NIR, Solusi Analisis Cepat dan Akurat di Berbagai Industri
content: NIR (Near InfraRed spectroscopy) atau spektroskopi inframerah dekat telah menjadi alat yang sangat berguna dalam analisis sampel di berbagai bidang industri. Teknologi ini memanfaatkan radiasi inframerah dekat untuk mengetahui komposisi atau karakteristik sampel. Dalam sektor pertanian, NIR digunakan untuk mengukur kadar air, protein, lemak, dan parameter lain pada tanaman, pakan, dan tanah. Di industri makanan, teknologi ini membantu dalam menentukan kandungan nutrisi dan komposisi kimia...

title: Sampo, la première coproduction cinématographique soviéto-occidentale
content: Quel point commun ont les films La Tente rouge (1969), Mio au royaume de nulle part (1987) et L’Oiseau bleu (1976)? Ces films ont tous été le fruit d’une collaboration entre des cinéastes soviétiques et étrangers. La toute première coproduction d‘envergure entre l’URSS et un pays occidental remonte toutefois à 1958, lorsqu’a été réalisé le film Sampo inspiré de l’épopée finno-carélienne du Kalevala. title: Richard Madeley snaps 'can we move on' as ITV's Good Morning Britain turns frosty

Nighttime resistance exercise 'activity breaks' may boost sleep duration, study finds
content: Resistance exercise 'activity breaks' at night may improve sleep length, suggest the findings of a small comparative study published in the open access journal BMJ Open Sport & Exercise Medicine. Three-minute breaks every 30 minutes over a period of 4 hours may be all that's needed, the findings indicate. Current recommendations discourage intense exercise before going to bed, on the grounds that it increases body temperature and heart rate, which can result in poorer sleep quality, say the...

title: Вячеслав Гладков сообщил белгородцам об уходе на больничный

По словам главы региона, вылечиться «на ногах» у него не получается. При этом руководитель области отметил, что остается в области. «Просто нужно немножко отлежаться. Надеюсь, что до понедельника поправлю свое здоровье и выйду на работу. Утренние, вечерние сообщения, постараюсь регулярно отправлять», – добавил Гладков. title: Eric John Andress
content: Eric John Andress Leesburg, VA - Eric Andress, 62, passed away peacefully at home on July 16th, 2024, surrounded by his family after a long illness. Eric graduated from Burnt Hills-Ballston Lake high school in 1980, and from Bryant University in RI in 1984. He is survived by his wife Nancy; his children Tyler and Shannon; his brothers Kurt (Donna) Andress and David (Jennifer) Andress; his sister Kathy Andress along with many nieces and nephews. Services will be in Leesburg VA.

content: Chandipura Virus: ગુજરાતમાં ચાંદીપુરા વાયરસથી મોતનો કિસ્સો સામે આવ્યો છે, ગઇકાલ સુધી ગુજરાતમાં કુલ 8 મોત હતા, જેમાં એકનો વધારો થયો છે. માહિતી છે કે, પંચમહાલ જિલ્લાની બાળકીનું ચાંદીપુરા વાયરસના કારણે મોત થયુ છે, આ બાળકી વડોદરાની હૉસ્પીટલમાં સારવાર હેઠળ હતી અને મોત થયા બાદ તેના સેમ્પલ પૂણેની લેબમાં ટેસ્ટિંગ માટે મોકલાયા છે. ચાંદીપુરા વાયરસનો કહેર દિવસેને દિવસે વધી રહ્યો છે. નોંધનીય છે કે, રાજ્યમાં કુલ 12 શંકાસ્પદ ચાંદીપુરા વાયરસ કેસ નોંધાયા છે. ચાંદીપુરા વાયરસથી આજે પંચમહાલમાં એક મોત થયુ છે,...

title: 13 million UK households warned they've been 'denied' NHS dentist check-up
creator: newsdesk@birminghamlive.co.uk (James Rodger)
content: 13 million people cannot see an NHS dentist because the option has "ceased to exist" for Brits, the British Dental Association has warned. The BDA met with Health Secretary and new Labour Party Cabinet Minister Wes Streeting to tell him reform is desperately needed. Shawn Charlwood, chair of the BDA, said: “ NHS dentistry has effectively ceased to exist for millions across this country. These numbers are a stark reminder we need ambition to save this service.” Analysis found 5.4 million people...

title: 6 Lifestyle Habits To Prevent Heart Disease In Women After Menopause
creator: Aanchal Mishra
content: Do you know menopause increases the risk of heart diseases? Adopt these 7 lifestyle habits to prevent heart disease in women post menopause. Menopause represents a natural phase marking the end of a woman's ability to reproduce, usually happening between ages 45 to 55. For women, grasping the details of this life stage is crucial for navigating it with insight and ease. content: Президент России Владимир Путин подписал указ о награждении жителя Орловской области медалью «За отвагу». title: Karachi Weather Alert for Ashura: Rain, thundershower to lash capital today
creator: Web Desk
content: Pakistan Meteorological Department (PMD) forecasted a spell of rain for Karachi today as the wet spell will provide relief from ongoing heatwave. Residents of Sindh capital - who are suffering from high temperatures recently - may finally get a break as Met Office predicts rain and thunderstorms in the city's suburbs today. The metropolis is expected to experience humid weather in early hours and rain is expected later in the day, with maximum temperatures ranging between 31-38 degree celcius....

title: World News | Pakistan Peoples Party Disowns Views of Members Against Proposal to Ban Imran Khan's Party
content: Islamabad [Pakistan], July 17 (ANI): Pakistan Peoples Party (PPP), a key ally of the ruling coalition in Pakistan, distanced itself from statements issued by some of its members opposing the government's plan to ban opposition Pakistan Tehreek-i-Insaf (PTI) as a political party, terming them as "personal" opinion, Pakistan-based daily, Dawn reported on Wednesday. PPP Secretary General Nayyar Hussain Bokhari told Dawn that the proposal to ban the now- jailed former Prime Minister Imran Khan-led...

title: Сухофрукты и орехи — о пользе этих продуктов рассказали на Новомосковском рынке
content: В чем состоит польза сухофруктов, рассказали специалисты Новомосковского рынка. Сухофрукты - высушенные фрукты или ягоды, с остаточной влажностью около 20 процентов. Сушатся естественным путём (например, на солнце), или с применением промышленных методов (например, с помощью дегидратора или сушилки для овощей). Многие считают, что сухофрукты менее полезны, чем фрукты. Однако это не так. Во-первых, в них много клетчатки, которая стимулирует пищеварение и обмен веществ. Имеют очищающее...

title: Mexicano Jarren Durán, encamina a la victoria a la Liga Americana y se vuelve el MVP del Juego de Estrellas 2024
content: El pelotero mexicano Jarren Durán estuvo a la altura de una estrella, disparó un jonrón de dos carreras para definir la victoria de la Liga Americana 5-3 sobre la Liga Nacional este martes, en el Juego de las Estrellas de las Grandes Ligas, celebrado en el Globe Life Field de Arlington, Texas. Con la victoria en el recinto en el que juegan los Rangers, la Americana (48-44) mantiene su dominio sobre la Nacional (44-48), pero en esta ocasión se contó con la actuación en plenitud de un...

title: Vicky's birthday wish to Katrina: A celebration of 'eat, pray, love'
Autocracy, Inc. by Anne Applebaum review – the devil you know
creator: John Simpson
content: Until around 2015, I tended to be moderately positive about the world. There were far more democracies than when I started at the BBC in 1966, I would tell myself, and markedly fewer dictatorships. Africa and Latin America, once host to so many military dictatorships, were now mostly run by elected leaders. The terrible threat of nuclear war had receded. A billion people were being lifted out of poverty. Yes, what Vladimir Putin had done in Crimea in 2014 was worrying, and Xi Jinping was...

title: Pictures from Slinky Winter Ball at the BIC in 1998
content: Bournemouth-born Slinky is one of the biggest trance brands of all time, enjoying global success and helping to put the UK trance scene on the map. But it wasn’t just down to the sales of CDs or merchandise – it was because they put on some of the best parties with many of the biggest DJs. Slinky’s original home was at the Opera House – now 02 Academy – but their fans also got to enjoy nights at the BIC, and later at Halo. These pictures are from Slinky Winter Ball at the BIC in 1998.

title: Paris mayor will swim in the Seine River to showcase its improved cleanliness ahead of the Olympics
content: PARIS (AP) — After months of anticipation, Paris Mayor Anne Hidalgo is set to swim in the Seine River later on Wednesday, fulfilling a promise she made in January nine days before the opening ceremony of the 2024 Olympics. The swim will occur along the stretch of the river that passes by the imposing-looking City Hall and the Notre Dame Cathedral as part of a broader effort to showcase the river’s improved cleanliness. Joining her will be Tony Estanguet, head of the Paris 2024 Games, and Marc...

title: مشاهده همای سعادت و جوجه‌اش از نزدیک + فیلم
creator: info@yjc.ir
content: همای سعادت یا هما در افسانه‌های ایران به عنوان یک نماد ارزشمند و مهم شناخته شده است. این موجود افسانه‌ای به نام علمی Gypaetus barbatus و ملقب به مرغ استخوان خوار، نقشی مهم در میراث فرهنگی ایران ایفا می‌کند. مرغ استخوان‌خوار، کرکس ریش‌دار یا همان همای سعادت افسانه‌های ایران است که ریشه در تاریخ این مرز و بوم دارد. تصویر این پرنده و جوجه‌اش در یکی از شهرستان‌های استان خراسان جنوبی گرفته شده شده است.

title: Sabah among states with least amount of EPF account holders, says regional director
content: KOTA KINABALU: Sabah has among the lowest number of Employees Provident Fund (EPF) account holders in the country, says EPF regional director for Sabah Mohd Fadil Sarehan. title: Чарльз ІІІ и Камилла прервали публичное мероприятие на Нормандских островах из-за угрозы их безопасности
content: Король Великобритании Чарльз ІІІ и королева-консорт Камилла вынуждены были прервать публичное мероприятие на Нормандских островах из-за угрозы их безопасности. Как сообщается, охрана монархов заподозрила возможное покушение на правителей, поэтому отвела их в гостиницу, чтобы проверить теорию. Как пишет The Telegraph , тревога оказалась ложной, поэтому король и королева уже через 20 минут вернулись к исполнению своих публичных обязанностей. title: 曼谷5星酒店命案—1死者血液檢出氰化物 FBI介入協助調查
creator: 星島頭條網
content: 泰國曼谷市中心一間5星級酒店發生6屍命案,死者是越南人,其中兩人擁有美國護照,初步懷疑他們是山埃中毒,不過警方要等驗屍後才能確定死因。美國聯邦調查局正協助泰國當局調查。 當地時間17日,泰國警方就曼谷酒店6名外籍住客死亡案召開新聞發布會。警方表示,在取證調查後,警方在死者房間內的杯子、水壺裡發現了氰化物。 相關新聞: 曼谷5星酒店命案—泰警飲品中發現可疑物質 兩人圖爬出房求救失敗 曼谷5星酒店命案—6越南人中山埃毒身亡 警追查一同行者下落 警方判斷兇手是6人中的1人。根據警方說法,6名死者之間存在私人債務糾紛,其中有1人投放了氰化物。目前已在1名死者的血液中檢測出氰化物,其他屍檢結果還需等待。 泰國總理賽塔今(17)日在接受媒體採訪時表示,美國聯邦調查局(FBI)已介入調查16日發生在曼谷市中心一間酒店內的6名外國人死亡案件。 7月16日,位於曼谷市中心繁華商業區的愛侶灣君悅酒店一間客房內發現了6具遺體,死者包括4名越南人和2名越南裔美國人。警方初步推測為謀殺,目前案件正在調查中。

title: Европу предупредили о планах стран Балтии оставить её без российской рыбы
creator: Платон Щукин
content: Страны Балтии планируют остановить поставки российской рыбы в Европу с помощью обвинений в незаконном промысле. Об этом в комментарии РИА Новости предупредил президент Всероссийской ассоциации рыбохозяйственных предприятий, предпринимателей и экспортеров (ВАРПЭ) Герман Зверев.

title: Popular Greater Manchester pub reopens after six-figure makeover and rebrand
creator: newsdesk@men-news.co.uk (Ramazani Mwamba)
content: A popular pub in Sale has reopened following a six-figure renovation. The Sale , formerly known as the Hungry Horse and The Moorfield, welcomed back punters on Friday (July 12). The public house closed its doors back in June for the makeover. It has returned as a Greene King venue, creating thirty new jobs according to the pubco, with a makeover including new, modern décor and a redesigned bar area. Enjoying an enviable location next to Walkden Botanic Gardens, the pub is also dog-friendly....

title: M1 live traffic updates as road blocked after double lorry crash
creator: editorial@examiner.co.uk (Tom Kershaw)
content: A crash between two lorries and a car is reportedly causing 40 minute delays in South Yorkshire this morning. Drivers heading northbound on the M1 will be hit by delays from Junction 32 at the M18 Interchange. Two lanes are closed while the vehicles are recovered. Traffic is stacked all the way back past Junction 31, traffic management systems say. title: 「日本第一牛郎」羅蘭現蹤台灣夜市!脫去西裝竟無人認出
content: 「日本第一牛郎」羅蘭憑藉著高顏值和一流的交際手腕,成為日本收入最高的男公關。(翻攝自羅蘭IG) 胡御柔/核稿編輯 〔娛樂頻道/綜合報導〕「日本第一牛郎」羅蘭 憑藉著高顏值和一流的交際手腕,年僅31歲就成為日本收入最高的男公關。近來他來台錄製節目,抽空走訪台中遊玩,16日現蹤逢甲夜市,脫下一身正裝的休閒狀態也曝光。 羅蘭16日現蹤逢甲夜市,脫下一身正裝的狀態也曝光。(翻攝自羅蘭IG) 羅蘭16日在IG分享多張在台中遊玩的照片,他先是去了逢甲夜市品嘗美食,從照片中可見他脫去一身正裝,身穿深色上衣跟簡單的棉褲,看起來相當低調。 請繼續往下閱讀... 羅蘭到台中知名景點去宮原眼科吃冰。(翻攝自羅蘭IG) 羅蘭再來則是 去宮原眼科吃冰,他用不熟練的中文在配文表示, 「雖然只能停留一天,但還是去了台中,宮原眼科診所確實是最好的。下次想去台南,有什麼推薦嗎?另外,請告訴我一個有很多可愛女人的城市」。 不用抽 不用搶 現在用APP看新聞 保證天天中獎 點我下載APP 按我看活動辦法

title: Notfälle: Mehrfamilienhaus brennt in Seelze
creator: ZEIT ONLINE: News -
content: In Seelze hat in der Nacht ein Mehrfamilienhaus gebrannt. Der Dachstuhl hat aus bislang ungeklärter Ursache Feuer gefangen, wie die Polizei mitteilte. Die Bewohner des Hauses mussten evakuiert werden. Der Brand habe sich auf das Nachbargebäude ausgeweitet. Schlagzeilen Laut Polizei gab es keine Verletzten. title: Rare new pictures show uncontacted Amazon tribe threatened by loggers
creator: Maroosha Muzaffar
content: New pictures have emerged of the Mashco Piro, a rarely-seen uncontacted Indigenous tribe in the remote Peruvian Amazon , amid concerns that logging activity is forcing them out of the dense rainforest more frequently. title: Электроснабжение на юге России восстановили после сбоя на Ростовской АЭС
content: На юге России восстановили электроснабжение, сообщает Минэнерго. Всем потребителям, которых затронули графики временного отключения, подали напряжение. Накануне, 16 июля, один из энергоблоков Ростовской атомной электростанции отключился из-за неполадок на турбогенераторе. Сбой затронул ряд южных регионов, временные графики ограничения потребления вводили в том числе в Ростовской области и Ставропольском крае. Материал дополняется

title: Whakapapa is identity, history
content: You may have heard people recite their whakapapa, genealogy, and often wondered why they do this. In Māori culture, whakapapa is a framework that connects people to their ancestors, weaving their past and present together, and establishing connections between whanau (family), significant places such as mountain ranges and rivers, myths and stories, and their wider community. Whakapapa is more than a family tree, it’s a narrative that traces an individual’s lineage back through the generations,...

title: Германия намерена вдвое сократить военную помощь Украине в 2025 году, - Reuters
content: Кабинет министров Германии планирует одобрить бюджет на 2025 год после месяцев споров, надеясь, что сильный экономический подъем поможет ему сократить разрыв в 17 млрд евро между прогнозируемыми расходами и доходами. Об этом сообщает РБК-Украина со ссылкой на Reuters. Крупнейшая экономика еврозоны избежала рецессии в начале года, но рост оказался медленнее, чем ожидалось, и правительство Германии, как и Великобритании и Франции, изо всех сил пытается закрыть бюджетную дыру. title: Colonials mess with Shakespeare and get a global hit
creator: Liz Hobday
content: One of the most successful operas ever made by an Australian composer is having its debut at the Sydney Opera House. Hamlet premiered at the 2017 Glyndebourne festival in the UK to critical accolades before playing at the Adelaide Festival, the Metropolitan Opera in New York, and in Germany. "It just feels so great to take this work, which has been acclaimed around the world, such an extraordinary piece of musical theatre, and to bring it home," said director Neil Armfield. title: Maharashtra news: Ahead of assembly polls, Eknath Shinde-led govt announces stipend for students. How much will they get
content: Maharashtra CM Eknath Shinde has announced stipend for students on the occassion of Ashadhi Ekadashi Day. As per the plan, 12th-grade pass students will receive a monthly stipend of ₹ 6,000, diploma students will receive ₹ 8,000, and graduates will get ₹ 10,000 for six-month internships. The announcement holds much significance as it comes ahead of Maharashtra assembly elections 2024

title: ANKETA Vruće vani, vruće i u moru: Pržite li se na plaži preko dana ili čekate noć za kupanje?
creator: 24sata
content: Toplinski val ne jenjava, a zbog toga je vruće i more. Ruše se temperaturni rekordi na obali, tako je temperatura mora proteklih dana u Dubrovniku iznosila gotovo 30 stupnjeva, a ništa bolje nije bilo ni na ostatku obale. Na Krku je more jutros u 8 sati 29 Celzija, u Puli 28,8, na Rabu 27, a jutros nigdje nije ispod 25. U brojnim mjestima u 8 sati je već i temperatura preko 30, a najtoplije je na Mljetu 32,2 Celzija, a 32 je i u Splitu i Komiži. U Hvaru je 30, kao i u Puli, Rijeci i Silbi....

title: New energy helps in green transition
content: Installations of new energy in China, including solar and wind, were predominant in the power sector last year, further accelerating the country's green and low-carbon transition, the China Electricity Council said. Major power companies completed investments exceeding 1.55 trillion yuan ($213 billion), an increase of 24.7 percent year-on-year. title: Israeli army seizes more Palestinian land in central occupied West Bank
content: RAMALLAH, Palestine The Israeli army expropriated more Palestinian lands in western Ramallah, in the central occupied West Bank, near existing illegal settlements, a Palestinian group said on Tuesday. The Israeli army seized 441 dunums (441,000 square meters) of lands from Palestinian citizens in the villages of Shabtin, Deir Ammar and Deir Qaddis in western Ramallah, the Wall and Settlement Resistance Commission said in a statement. title: New NHS cervical screening rules for millions of women in UK
creator: newsdesk@birminghamlive.co.uk (James Rodger)
content: Women in England could be offered a DIY cervical screening test on the NHS under new rules. Research suggests at-home tests could encourage 400,000 more women a year to have a screening, in a hope the rollout could boost numbers. Nearly a third of women in England – particularly younger women, those from minority ethnic backgrounds and deprived areas – have not taken up their most recent test. Academics at King’s College London conducted the biggest trial of self-sampling in the UK to date....

title: Traffic lights still out on posthouse roundabout today
content: MOTORISTS are being warned of traffic light failure on the Posthouse roundabout again this morning (July 17). The lights at the busy roundabout between Wrexham and Chester were out all day yesterday (July 16) causing huge delays along the A55 and A483. Now drivers have taken to social media to state that lights on the roundabout are out again this morning. title: Los objetivos de la UE en materia de hidrógeno verde no son realistas, según los auditores
content: La Comisión Europea ha establecido objetivos para producir hasta 10 millones de toneladas de hidrógeno renovable para 2030 e importar otros 10 millones de toneladas. Aunque no son vinculantes, los objetivos forman parte de los planes del bloque para acabar con su dependencia de las importaciones rusas de energía. En un informe, el TCE afirma que esos objetivos se basan en la "voluntad política" y no en un análisis sólido, y que la UE está muy lejos de alcanzarlos. Otro objetivo...

title: Gli obiettivi dell'Unione Europea sull'idrogeno verde non sono realistici, dicono i revisori dei conti
content: La Commissione Europea ha stabilito degli obiettivi per produrre fino a 10 milioni di tonnellate di idrogeno rinnovabile entro il 2030 e importare altri 10 milioni di tonnellate. Pur non essendo vincolanti, gli obiettivi fanno parte dei piani del blocco per porre fine alla dipendenza dalle importazioni di energia dalla Russia. creator: Tsvetana Paraskova
content: Oil prices continued to be weighed down in Asian trade on Wednesday by growing concerns about China’s economic growth and oil demand which were offsetting an estimated drop in U.S. crude oil inventories. In Asian trade, both benchmarks were dropping by around 0.2%, with the U.S. benchmark clawing back to the $80 per barrel handle after falling to $79.50 earlier on Wednesday. title: Fight against price rises sees UK inflation hold steady in June
content: UK inflation held steady in June as price rises across the county stayed at the Bank of England’s target level for another month running (Charlotte Coney/PA) UK inflation held steady in June as price rises across the county stayed at the Bank of England’s target level for the second month running, according to official figures. The rate of Consumer Prices Index inflation remained unchanged at 2% in June, the Office for National Statistics (ONS) said.

title: Минэнерго: на юге России восстановили электроснабжение
creator: Екатерина  Будённая
content: Специалисты восстановили электроснабжение на юге России после приостановки подачи ресурса в рамках графика временного отключения потребления (ГВО). Об этом Минэнерго страны. «Министерство продолжает в оперативном порядке отслеживать ситуацию с энергоснабжением регионов, в которых наблюдаются аномально высокие температуры», — отметили в ведомстве. ГВО накануне из-за сбоя в работе генерирующего оборудования на Ростовской АЭС, чтобы сохранить устойчивость энергосистемы.

title: गाजियाबाद में पुलिस चेकिंग से भागते बदमाश को लगी गोली:कब्जे से पिस्तौल-कारतूस बरामद, 12 जुलाई को बदमाशों ने अस्पताल के बाहर की थी फायरिंग

title: The rise and fall of Worcester's glove-making industry
content: It decided to end the ban on the import of gloves. During the 1700s, aided by the waterborne highway of the River Severn which facilitated the transport of raw materials, the city had grown to be the centre of the country's glove-making industry. In 1777 Dents built the first glove factory on South Quay and became the first to industrialise the process of preparing leather and cutting the designs. title: Siblings of autistic children face increased autism risk, new research confirms
content: Siblings of autistic children have a 20% chance of being autistic themselves -; about seven times higher than the rate in infants with no autistic siblings. That's the key finding of a new paper by UC Davis MIND Institute researcher Sally Ozonoff and the Baby Siblings Research Consortium. The consortium is a collection of more than 20 research groups at universities worldwide. Ozonoff is a distinguished professor in the Department of Psychiatry and Behavioral Sciences. content: ഇവിടെ പോസ്റ്റു ചെയ്യുന്ന അഭിപ്രായങ്ങൾ മലയാള മനോരമയുടേതല്ല. അഭിപ്രായങ്ങളുടെ പൂർണ ഉത്തരവാദിത്തം രചയിതാവിനായിരിക്കും. കേന്ദ്ര സർക്കാരിന്റെ ഐടി നയപ്രകാരം വ്യക്തി, സമുദായം, മതം, രാജ്യം എന്നിവയ്ക്കെതിരായി അധിക്ഷേപങ്ങളും അശ്ലീല പദപ്രയോഗങ്ങളും നടത്തുന്നത് ശിക്ഷാർഹമായ കുറ്റമാണ്. ഇത്തരം അഭിപ്രായ പ്രകടനത്തിന് നിയമനടപടി കൈക്കൊള്ളുന്നതാണ്.

title: Liga protiv raka Orebić donirala Dom Ravno
content: "Danas je naš starački dom posjetilo osoblje iz udruge "Liga protiv raka općine Orebić". Njihova udruga je donirala pelene za naše stare i nemoćne. Od srca se zahvaljujemo na bogatoj donaciji", objavili su na Facebook stanici Doma Ravno. Dom u Ravnome brine i o mnogim Dubrovčanima i stanovnicima šire dubrovačke okolice starije dobi koji svoje mjesto nisu mogli pronaći negdje bliže, ali su im djelatnice njihovog novog doma sve to nadoknadile svojom pažnjom i odnosom prema njima.

title: ¿Qué comen los omnívoros? Descubre las claves de su dieta variada
creator: Yolaisi García
content: En el mundo animal , la dieta es un factor crucial para la supervivencia y adaptación de las especies. Los omnívoros , una categoría que abarca desde diminutos insectos hasta criaturas de gran tamaño como los seres humanos, tienen una dieta que va más allá de lo monótono. Estos organismos muestran una notable capacidad para consumir una amplia variedad de alimentos, incluyendo plantas, animales, algas y hongos, de acuerdo con National Geographic Education. title: 泰國去年關閉近2000家工廠 製造業衰退重創經濟
content: 泰國製造業面臨成本上升及外企激烈競爭,一年關閉近2000家工廠。(彭博) 吳孟峰/核稿編輯 〔財經頻道/綜合報導〕近年中國赴泰國的投資持續增長,雖然推升泰國經濟,但也因為中國進口產品的競爭,加上能源成本上升、勞動力老化,泰國工廠陸續倒閉,光是在去年就關閉近2000家工廠,導致佔泰國GDP近4分之1的製造業搖搖欲墜,專家表示,泰國長達數十年的製造業驅動型經濟模式已經被打破。 外媒報導,泰國製造業在2023年7月至2024年6月的工廠關閉數量,較前12個月的大增40%,失業人數也激增80%至5萬1500人,當地不僅開設新工廠的速度放緩,還有不少製造工廠仍陸續關閉,已蔓延至汽車業等作為經濟主要趨動力的產業。 請繼續往下閱讀... 另外,由於能源價格上漲和工資相對較高,小型製造商須要面對生產成本的上升以及跨國企業的激烈競爭,只要無法適應或提出解決辦法,就會走向不得不關閉業務或是倒閉的情況。...

title: 'ജടായു പിടഞ്ഞുവീണത് ഇതാ ഇവിടെയാണ്'; രാമായണ കഥ നിറയുന്ന കൊല്ലത്തെ ഗ്രാമങ്ങള്‍
content: ച ടയമംഗലത്തിനും വെളിനല്ലൂരിനും ചുറ്റുവട്ടത്തെ ഗ്രാമങ്ങളിലെല്ലാം രാമകഥ തുടിക്കുന്നുണ്ട്. 'ഇവിടെയാണ് ജടായു പിടഞ്ഞുവീണത്', 'ബാലി-സുഗ്രീവ യുദ്ധം നടന്നത് ഇതാ ഇവിടെയാണ്' എന്നൊക്കെ ചൂണ്ടിക്കാണിക്കാന്‍ ഓരോ സ്ഥലങ്ങളുണ്ടിവിടെ. നൂറ്റാണ്ടുകളായി പറഞ്ഞുപതിഞ്ഞ ഇതിഹാസ വിശേഷങ്ങള്‍ നിറയെയുണ്ട് ഈ ഗ്രാമങ്ങളില്‍. ഉഗ്രന്‍കുന്നും വാലിയാംകുന്നും വെളിനല്ലൂര്‍ ശ്രീരാമസ്വാമിക്ഷേത്രം നില്‍ക്കുന്നത് ഉഗ്രന്‍കുന്നിലാണ്. സുഗ്രീവന്‍ വസിച്ചിരുന്ന സുഗ്രീവന്‍കുന്ന് ലോപിച്ചാണ് ഉഗ്രന്‍കുന്നായതെന്നാണ് വിശ്വാസം. ക്ഷേത്രത്തിന്റെ...

title: WhatsApp ने लॉन्च किया नया 'Favorites' फीचर
content: WhatsApp उन लोगों से संपर्क में रहना आसान बना रहा है जो सबसे ज़्यादा मायने रखते हैं. इसी कड़ी में WhatsApp ने अपने नए “Favorites” फ़ीचर के लॉन्च की घोषणा की. इस फीचर को संचार को सुव्यवस्थित करने और आपके सबसे नज़दीकी लोगों को प्राथमिकता देने के लिए डिज़ाइन किया गया है. “Favorites” उपयोगकर्ताओं को ऐप के भीतर अपने सबसे ज़्यादा संपर्क किए जाने वाले व्यक्तियों और समूहों की एक व्यक्तिगत सूची बनाने की अनुमति देता है. यह सूची कॉल टैब के शीर्ष पर आसानी से सुलभ होगी, जिससे आपके फेवरेट कॉन्टैक्ट्स को कॉल...

title: Muharram teaches not to compromise with injustice: Mamata
content: Kolkata : Stating that Muharram teaches not to compromise with injustice, West Bengal Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee on Wednesday urged the people to follow the path of peace and prosperity. পবিত্র মহরম অন্যায়ের সঙ্গে আপোশ না করার শিক্ষা দেয়। আসুন, আমরা সকলে মিলে শান্তি ও সমৃদ্ধির পথে এগিয়ে যাই। “Holy Muharram teaches not to compromise with injustice. Let us all move forward on the path of peace and prosperity,” Banerjee posted on X.

title: Rajasthan BJP MLA's ‘4 begums, 36 children’ jibe at Muslims, Congress hits back
南市幼兒園創訂自主風險管理檢核表 每2週內控1次
content: 南市制定幼兒園自主風險管理檢核表,以確保教保安全環境。(南市教育局提供) 〔記者洪瑞琴/台南報導〕有鑑於近來國內發生多起教保服務人員違法事件,為加強幼兒園內部自我管控及風險意識,南市創新訂定「教保服務機構自主風險管理檢核表」,通函各所每2週自我檢核1次,並專卷保存3年,建立親師信賴以落實教保安全環境。 檢核表分成「幼兒保護」、「衛生保健」及「園舍安全」3面向,每個面向再細分為「平時管理」及「覺察辨識」2大項,總計24項次重要檢核內容,南市教育局自今年7月12日起通函全市各公私立幼兒園全面落實內部自我管控機制。 依檢核事項內容,各園應定期宣導教職員皆不得對幼兒有不當管教或體罰等行為,也要求各園主動覺察幼兒表現有無異狀,以利即時掌控依法通報案件並連繫家長說明後續處遇方式,強化親師溝通。此外,各園平日也應落實幼兒點名及環境巡檢,防止幼兒獨處危險及角落安全疑慮等。 台南市長黃偉哲強調,虐童及體罰零容忍是市府既定政策,為確保幼兒能在友善安全環境中成長,因此由教育局訂定自主風險管理檢核表,落實園方平時自主檢核,以提高主動察覺及預防違法事件發生能力,降低危害風險並提高幼兒保護機制。...

title: 奶瓶、不沾鍋暗藏危機?PFAS恐破壞母乳、奶粉關鍵蛋白質
content: 研究發現,日常用品中的有毒化合物恐干擾母乳與嬰兒奶粉中的重要蛋白質;圖為示意圖,圖中人物與本文無關。(圖取自pixabay) 〔編譯陳成良/綜合報導〕你是否想過,我們每天使用的日用品,可能隱藏著危害嬰兒健康的危機?美國德州大學艾爾帕索分校(UTEP)的最新研究揭露,奈米塑膠和稱之為「永遠化學品」的「全氟/多氟烷基物質」(PFAS),這些普遍存在於塑膠製品、炊具和衣物中的物質,竟會改變母乳和嬰兒配方奶粉中關鍵蛋白質的結構,進而影響嬰兒的發育。 PFAS其實是總稱,含括了4700種以上的含氟化合物,具有持久性與生物累積性,在環境中不易分解。 請繼續往下閱讀... 據《每日科技網》(scitechdaily)7月15日報導,奈米塑膠來自於塑膠製品的分解,而 PFAS 則被廣泛應用於不沾鍋、防水衣物等產品中。這些人造化合物在環境中幾乎無所不在,且難以被自然分解,近年來已證實會對人體健康造成負面影響。然而,UTEP 的研究團隊更進一步發現,奈米塑膠和 PFAS 會直接影響母乳和嬰兒配方奶粉中的重要蛋白質,例如...

title: ഫ്രഞ്ച് ടീമിനെ അധിക്ഷേപിച്ച് വീഡിയോ; വെട്ടിലായി അർജന്റീന

title: 'கவர்ச்சியாக நடிக்க நிறைய அழைப்புகள் வந்தன ஆனால்... '- ஐஸ்வர்யா ராஜேஷ்
creator: தினத்தந்தி
content: சென்னை, தமிழ் சினிமாவின் முன்னணி நடிகைகளில் ஒருவராக வலம் வருபவர் ஐஸ்வர்யா ராஜேஷ். சமீபத்தில் இவர் நடிப்பில் வெளியான படம் டியர். இப்படம் கடந்த ஏப்ரல் மாதம் 11-ம் தேதி திரையரங்குகளில் வெளியானது. தற்போது, கன்னட சூப்பர் ஸ்டார் சிவராஜ்குமாருக்கு ஜோடியாக 'உத்தரகாண்டா' படத்தில் ஐஸ்வர்யா ராஜேஷ் நடித்துவருகிறார். இப்படத்தை ரோஹித் படக்கி இயக்குகிறார். இந்த படம் மூலம் ஐஸ்வர்யா ராஜேஷ் கன்னட திரையுலகில் அறிமுகமாகியுள்ளார். இந்நிலையில் நடிகை ஐஸ்வர்யா ராஜேஷ் தனக்கு பொருத்தமான கதாபாத்திரத்தில் நடிக்க...

title: 真的沒錢了?中國地方政府追回民眾「失業金」
content: 不少中國民眾反映,被官方要求退還已領取的失業金,其中深圳為大宗。(示意圖,美聯社) 高佳菁/核稿編輯 〔財經頻道/綜合報導〕中國經濟低迷,各地領取失業金的人數不斷上升,近期根據媒體報導,不少中國民眾反映,近來申請失業金的審核門檻不僅趨嚴,甚至有人被官方要求退還已領取的失業金,其中深圳為大宗。 美國之音(VOA)報導,《南華早報》日前指出,深圳市官方最新數據顯示,今年第1季新增登記失業人數逾4萬人,創下歷史新高,不但較前1季上升15%,更較去年同期激增40%。 請繼續往下閱讀... 深圳市人力資源與社會保障局公布,2023年全市領取失業金人數達21.15萬人,較2022年增35%。而在中國,領取失業金的先決條件是先登記失業,因此代表全深圳有資格領取失業金的人數也大增。 最近小紅書、微博等中國網路平台上,有不少網友分享,近來中國領取失業金的審核門檻變得很嚴格,甚至還被當地政府要求歸還失業金,其中以深圳網友為大宗。...

title: Fight against price rises sees UK inflation hold steady in June

title: 56歲自駕遊暴紅 婦60歲花16萬離婚「買一個自由」
content: 以「56歲自駕遊」逃離沉悶婚姻的蘇敏,在網上發布視頻稱,將付給丈夫16萬元(人民幣,下同,約2.2萬美元)簽訂協議離婚。今年60歲的她坦言這筆金錢的確不少,但「16萬買我一個自由」,以後她再也不用擔驚受怕了。蘇敏的決定引來網友的支持,鼓勵她「雖然不容易,但未來只為自己好好過」。 來源:YouTube 紅星新聞報導,蘇敏的丈夫原本提出要50萬元才肯離婚,在律師、子女的勸說溝通後,丈夫終於同意。蘇敏表示,16萬元對她來說確有壓力,但在子女的支持下,咬一咬牙還是能承受。她感慨:「誰也不知道,結婚時滿臉笑容的人,會是這個樣子。」 不少網友表示,拖著不離婚就能「一分錢不給」,蘇敏表示,如果走向法庭,她與先生所有的財產都要對半分,包括她最看重的自媒體帳號,蘇敏因帳號收穫了粉絲的陪伴與鼓勵,也賺得經濟收入,這個帳號是她這輩子最驕傲的事,絕對不能分給先生。 蘇敏近期自駕到了貴州,她說因為操心離婚,沒有心情遊玩。雖然丈夫口頭承諾不會變卦,但接下來還有複雜的手續要辦。由於夫妻倆的結婚證遺失了,按照法律程序,需要先補辦結婚證,才能推進離婚程序。因此,蘇敏計畫盡快趕回河南,以免再生變故。...

content: به گزارش “ورزش سه”، تیم فوتبال ملوان این روزها امور نقل و انتقالاتی خود را با استفاده از بازیکنان سرباز پیش می‌برد و آماده حضور در رقابت‌های لیگ بیست و چهارم می‌شود. در تازه‌ترین انتقال رضا میرزایی ، وینگر تیم استقلال که فصل گذشته دچار مصدومیت شد و لیگ را از دست داد، راهی انزلی شده تا به این تیم ملحق شود. میرزایی که در سپاهان روزهای خوبی داشت، جلسه نهایی را همراه با امید نورافکن در باشگاه ملوان با مدیرعامل این تیم برگزار خواهد کرد. پیش از این ابوالفضل جلالی و علیرضا جعفرپور هم به این تیم ملحق...

creator: 강우진 기자
content: 휠라(FILA)는 자사가 후원하는 테니스 선수 바르보라 크레이치코바(체코)가 영국 메이저 테니스 대회 여자 단식에서 우승했다고 17일 밝혔다. 휠라는 이를 축하하기 위해 테니스 관련 아이템 30% 깜짝 할인 혜택을 제공한다. 크레이치코바는 지난 14일(한국시간) 영국 런던 올잉글랜드 클럽에서 열린 세계 4대 테니스 대회 여자 단식 결승에서 자스민 파올리니(이탈리아, 세계 랭킹 7위)를 2대1(6-2 2-6 6-4)로 꺾고 우승을 차지했다. 그간 복식에서 두각을...

title: ‘India is land of diverse religions’: Madras HC says Muslim policemen can keep beard on duty
creator: Scroll Staff
content: The Madras High Court held in an order earlier this month that Muslim policemen in Tamil Nadu are allowed to maintain trimmed and tidy beads on duty. Justice L Victoria Gowri passed the ruling on July 5 while hearing the case of a police constable, G Abdul Khadar Ibrahim, who was punished for appearing before a superior officer with a beard after he returned from his pilgrimage to Mecca. The order was made public on Tuesday. Ibrahim’s counsel argued before the court that as per the Madras...

title: Fit man gets prostate cancer then breast cancer within four months
creator: newsdesk@birminghamlive.co.uk (Neil Shaw)
content: A “fit and healthy” man who suddenly collapsed, then was diagnosed with prostate and breast cancer in the space of four months, is encouraging men to “talk to somebody” and “act quickly” if they suspect something is wrong. Roger Stanley, 64, who lives in Shrewsbury, Shropshire, was first diagnosed with prostate cancer in March 2023 after having PSA tests, which measure the amount of prostate-specific antigen (PSA) in the blood. He underwent a radical prostatectomy – surgery to remove the entire...

title: [밀양소식]시자원봉사센터, 우리 이웃은 우리가 보살핀다 등

title: Inflation at Bank of England's 2% target for second straight month
creator: Michael Hunter
content: Business The main measure of inflation is bang on the Bank of England’s official target for the second consecutive month according to official data out this morning, in the latest sign that an interest rate cut could be imminent. The year-on-year reading of consumer price index (CPI) for June stayed at 2% according to the Office for National Statistics. That was slightly higher than 1.9% forecast, but it left it at its lowest in nearly three years. Members of the Monetary Policy Committee are...

title: Tuskegee syphilis study whistleblower Peter Buxtun has died at age 86
creator: Associated Press
content: NEW YORK: Peter Buxtun, the whistleblower who revealed that the U.S. government allowed hundreds of Black men in rural Alabama to go untreated for syphilis in what became known as the Tuskegee study, has died. He was 86. Buxtun died May 18 of Alzheimer’s disease in Rocklin, California, according to his attorney, Minna Fernan. Buxtun is revered as a hero to public health scholars and ethicists for his role in bringing to light the most notorious medical research scandal in US history. Documents...

title: FG Panel Reveals Reasons For Plateau School Collapse
creator: Enioluwa Adeniyi
content: The Federal Government’s investigative panel has issued an initial finding on the tragic collapse of the two-storey building housing Saint Academy in Jos, Plateau State, which resulted in 22 fatalities. The collapse, which occurred on a Friday morning at about 8:30 am, also left approximately 154 individuals trapped, all of whom have since been evacuated to various medical facilities. During a press briefing in Jos, the Director General of the Nigerian Building and Road Research Institute, Prof...

title: ಮಹಾರಾಷ್ಟ್ರ ರಾಜಕಾರಣದಲ್ಲಿ ಸಂಚಲನ; ಡಿಸಿಎಂ ಅಜಿತ್ ಪವಾರ್ ಬಣದ ನಾಯಕರು ಘರ್ ವಾಪ್ಸಿ!
content: ಮುಂಬೈ: ಮಹಾರಾಷ್ಟ್ರ ರಾಜಕಾರಣದಲ್ಲಿ (Maharashtra Politics) ಘರ್ ವಾಪ್ಸಿ (Ghar Vapsi) ಶುರುವಾಗಿದೆ. ಡಿಸಿಎಂ ಅಜಿತ್ ಪವಾರ್‌ (DCM Ajit Pawar) ನೇತೃತ್ವದ ಎನ್‌ಸಿಪಿಯ ನಾಲ್ವರು ನಾಯಕರು (NCP Leaders) ಪಕ್ಷದಿಂದ ಹೊರ ಬಂದಿದ್ದಾರೆ ಎಂದು ವರದಿಯಾಗಿದೆ. ಪಿಂಪ್ರಿ-ಚಿಂಚ್ವಾಡದ ಈ ನಾಲ್ಕು ನಾಯಕರು, ಶೀಘ್ರದಲ್ಲಿಯೇ ಶರದ್ ಪವಾರ್ (Sharad Pawar) ನೇತೃತ್ವದ ಎನ್‌ಸಿಪಿ ಸೇರ್ಪಡೆಯಾಗುವ ಸಾಧ್ಯತೆಗಳಿವೆ. ಲೋಕಸಭಾ ಚುನಾವಣೆಯಲ್ಲಿ (Loksabha Election 2024) ಅಜಿತ್ ಪವಾರ್ ನೇತೃತ್ವದ ಎನ್‌ಸಿಪಿಯ ಕಳಪೆ ಪ್ರದರ್ಶನ ಹಿನ್ನೆಲೆ ಸ್ಥಳೀಯ ನಾಯಕರು ಪಕ್ಷ ತೊರೆಯುವ ನಿರ್ಧಾರಕ್ಕೆ ಬಂದಿದ್ದಾರೆ....

title: Assam government hands over site to Tata for semiconductor plant in Morigaon
content: Assam-government-owned land site in Morigaon, where the Tata Group will set up a mega semiconductor plant, has been formally handed over after a lease agreement, making way for the construction to be commenced soon. Today marked a significant milestone as the land agreement for Tata Group’s semiconductor project in Jagiroad, Morigaon district, was successfully finalized. The agreement, signed at the Sub-Registrar’s office, Morigaon leases 517.27 bighas of land to Tata Group for a duration of 60...

title: 台南夏日音樂節「將軍吼」7/20、7/21登場 遊客注意交管時間
content: 將軍吼在將軍漁港搭配煙火秀舉辦。(圖由南市觀旅局提供) 〔記者楊金城/台南報導〕2024台南夏日音樂節「將軍吼」,7月20日、21日將在將軍漁港搭配煙火秀熱鬧登場,學甲警分局針對活動周邊道路將在2天上午11點開始交通管制,遊客要注意各項管制措施,並依動線停車。 南市觀旅局局長林國華表示,歡迎民眾搭乘大眾交通工具前往將軍港,也可付費預約活動合作之台灣大車隊計程車往返將軍漁港。最近因午後雷陣雨,樂迷並要隨身攜帶雨具、做好防曬、補充水分。 請繼續往下閱讀... 7月20、21日,將軍漁港交通與場地管制措施如下: 煙火施放場域及演唱會廣場管制:將軍漁港南、北堤禁止人車進入;將軍漁港觀景平台及陸域範圍非經許可也禁止進入。 將軍漁會聯外道路管制:7月20日上午11點至晚上10點、7月21日上午11點至晚上9點,將軍區南25線區道(台61線將軍交流道至將軍漁港)、將軍漁港、馬沙溝濱海遊憩區周邊道路管制路段,視交通狀況實施彈性管制。 煙火施放區周邊管制:往海商餐廳方向及往海巡署將軍漁港安檢所方向進行人車管制。...

content: On the auspicious occasion of Ashadhi Ekadashi, Bollywood actor Sonu Sood visited Siddhivinayak temple in Dadar, Mumbai, to seek blessings. title: Encroachment on glacier: Self-styled godman illegally constructs temple at 5,000 metres height in Uttarakhand
content: A self-styled godman, Baba Yogi Chaitanya Akash, allegedly built an unauthorised shrine at a height of 5,000 metres on Uttarakhand's Sunderdhunga glacier. A joint team consisting of personnel from revenue, forest and police departments will investigate the matter after local villagers expressed their anger over the encroachment, reported Indian Express. title: ஒரே நாளில் பெங்களூரை சுற்றி பார்க்க சுற்றுலாதளங்களின் பட்டியல்..!
content: ஒரே நாளில் பெங்களூரை சுற்றி பார்க்க வேண்டுமா..? உங்களுக்கான சுற்றுலாதளங்களின் பட்டியல்..! நகரத்தின் சலசலப்பில் இருந்து தப்பித்து, குடும்பத்தோடு நிம்மதியாக ஒருநாள் சந்தோஷமாக வெளியே செல்ல வேண்டும் என விரும்புகிறவர்களுக்கும் கடைசி நிமிடத்தில் சுற்றுலாவிற்கு செல்ல திட்டமிடுபவர்களுக்கும், பெங்களூருவில் இருந்து சிறிது தூரத்திலேயே பல அருமையான இடங்கள் உள்ளன.

title: Traces of cyanide discovered alongside 6 victims found dead in a Bangkok hotel room, Thai police say
creator: Associated Press
content: BANGKOK — The chief of the Thai police forensic division said Wednesday that police have found traces of cyanide in the cups of six people found dead in a central Bangkok luxury hotel. The bodies were found Tuesday in Grand Hyatt Erawan Hotel in downtown Bangkok. Upon checking hotel records, there were no other visitors to the room apart from the six that were found, police said. title: Lost wall hanging recovered, but two-thirds of Diana Wood Conroy's tapestries are yet to be found
creator: Sarah Moss
content: In her youth, Diana Wood Conroy created a tapestry every six weeks. But in the decades since, many of her tapestries have been lost as the buildings they were hung in have been refurbished or demolished. A new exhibition about the artist illuminates her 60 years of work, along with her ambition of connecting modern and ancient art though tapestry. content: A viral video showed thousands of people jostling with each other outside Mumbai airport A recruitment drive for airport loaders led to a stampede-like situation at Mumbai airport yesterday. title: Rain continues to lash hilly terrain in Coimbatore
content: Rain continued to lash the hilly terrain in the district and the total rainfall recorded till 8.30 a.m. on Wednesday, July 17, 2024 was 538.10 mm and the average rainfall across the 13 observatories was 23.40 mm. title: Luzon grid under yellow alert on Wednesday afternoon
content: The Luzon power grid will be placed under yellow alert on Wednesday afternoon until evening due to a forced outage of a plant that resulted in thinning reserve, the National Grid Corporation of the Philippines (NGCP) said. title: Fight against price rises sees UK inflation hold steady in June
creator: Anna Wise
content: UK inflation held steady in June as price rises across the county stayed at the Bank of England’s target level for the second month running, according to official figures. The rate of Consumer Prices Index inflation remained unchanged at 2% in June, the Office for National Statistics (ONS) said. It follows nearly three years of above-target inflation with households squeezed by soaring food and energy prices. title: Four confirmed with Malaria in Malappuram; alert issued
content: MALAPPURAM: Four people are confirmed with Marsh Fever (Malaria) in Malappuram. The disease is confirmed on one in Nilambur and three in Ponnani. Out of 1200 blood samples tested in Ponnani, three women were confirmed of the disease. A migrant labourer from Orissa in Nilambur was confirmed of malaria. Malaria Malaria spreads through mosquitoes. It can also be transmitted by receiving the blood of an infected person. Malaria is caused by single-celled parasites belonging to the genus Plasmodium....

title: 面試經典問題「為何要錄取你」該怎麼回?考官揭3思路:公司要找即戰力
content: 有一次 面試 到最後一關時被問了一題「為什麼我們要錄取你?」,當下覺得有點被冒犯,但是還是說出我覺得我很努力,也適合團隊合作,重點是我想要來到這個部門和 職位 學習。 雖然最後運氣好有上了該職位,但是有一天我和主管在茶水間聊天時,他突然說:「你知道當初你面試的時候有說到你希望來到我們部門學習,但是我得老實跟你說,主管有時候招募人是希望可以 找到即戰力,就算不是即戰力,也要體現價值,我們不是找人來學習的。 」 我才知道不管是立竿見影的價值,或是值得公司投資自己未來的價值,我們都得學會包裝自己。就像買股票一樣,如果今天老闆在法說會上面說我們公司真的很努力,投資人是不會買單的。 這個問題被設計出來的目的在於了解 受試者是否了解自身的優勢,以及他們如何表達這些優勢。 在問題背後的問題(Question behind the question)是受試者能不能放大自己的優勢,達到和別人的差異化,從自己能帶來的價值出發。 也因為這題有時候可能來得很突然,某種程度上是在測試受試者的臨場反應能力。是否能重新回想面試中講的事情,重新有邏輯和清晰的溝通自己的價值主張。...

content: Пермский людоед и живодер Михаил Малышев освободился из тюрьмы и устроился работать в приют для бездомных животных. Об этом пишет телеграм-канал SHOT. Малышеву сейчас 58 лет. content: കേരളത്തിൽ സർവ സാധാരണമായി ഉപയോഗിക്കുന്ന ചെരുപ്പാണ് സ്ലിപ്പറുകൾ. എന്നാൽ നമ്മുടെ നാട്ടിൽ കുറഞ്ഞ വിലയ്‌ക്ക് കിട്ടുന്ന ഈ ചെരുപ്പുകൾ കുവൈറ്റിൽ വാങ്ങണമെങ്കിൽ ലക്ഷങ്ങൾ കൊടുക്കേണ്ടി വരും. ഇതിന്റെ വീഡിയോ ആണ് ഇപ്പോൾ സമൂഹ മാദ്ധ്യമങ്ങളിൽ നിറഞ്ഞുകൊണ്ടിരിക്കുന്നത്. 'ട്രെൻഡ്, ഏറ്റവും പുതിയ ഫാഷൻ സനോബ, വില 4500 റിയാൽ' എന്ന് അറബിയിൽ തലക്കെട്ട് നൽകിക്കൊണ്ടാണ് വീഡിയോ പങ്കുവച്ചിരിക്കുന്നത്. 4,500 റിയാൽ എന്നത് 1,00,245 രൂപയാണ്. ഒരു ചില്ല് കൂട്ടിൽ വിൽപ്പനയ്‌ക്ക് വച്ചിരിക്കുന്ന സ്ലിപ്പറുകളാണ് വീഡിയോയിൽ...

title: മുണ്ടുടുത്ത് എത്തിയ ആളെ മാളിനുള്ളിൽ കടത്തിയില്ല, വ്യാപക പ്രതിഷേധം
content: ബംഗളൂരു: മുണ്ടുടുത്ത് ഷോപ്പിംഗ് മാളിലെത്തിയ വൃദ്ധന് പ്രവേശനം നിഷേധിച്ചു. ബംഗളൂരുവിലെ ജിടി മാളിലാണ് സംഭവം. വൃദ്ധനെയും മകനെയും സെക്യൂരിറ്റി ഉദ്യോഗസ്ഥർ തടഞ്ഞുനിറുത്തുന്ന വീഡിയോ സോഷ്യൽമീഡിയയിൽ പ്രചരിച്ചതോടെ വ്യാപക പ്രതിഷേധം ഉയരുന്നുണ്ട്. കഴിഞ്ഞദിവസം വൈകുന്നേരമായിരുന്നു സംഭവം. മാളിലെ സിനിമാ തിയേറ്ററിൽ വൃദ്ധനും മകനും സിനിമയ്ക്ക് ടിക്കറ്റ് ബുക്കുചെയ്തിരുന്നു. സിനിമ കാണുന്നതിനുവേണ്ടി ടിക്കറ്റുമായി എത്തിയപ്പോഴാണ് ഇരുവരെയും തടഞ്ഞത്. മുണ്ട് ധരിച്ചവർക്ക് മാളിൽ പ്രവേശനം അനുവദിക്കുന്നില്ലെന്നാണ്...

title: Hajduk ga odbacio, ali nije se predavao. Evo ga u Bundesligi, uz Vatrenog
content: Pisali smo o već nekoliko puta, dok je briljirao u Wehen Wiesbadenu, te smo još tada najavljivali kako bi ovaj 28-godišnji napadač mogao napraviti veliki iskorak u karijeri. I nismo pogriješili. Jer dok je njegov, sada već bivši klub, ispao u niži rang natjecanja, on je otišao stepenicu više, u njemačku Bundesligu, te ćemo ga u sezoni koja je pred vratima gledati u konkurenciji Bayera, Bayerna, Borussije... 'Bilo je jasno da neću dobiti priliku u prvom sastavu. A kako su klubovi...

title: Nadal beats Swedish great Borg’s son Leo in singles return at Bastad
creator: none@none.com (Reuters)
content: Former world number one Rafa Nadal marked his return to singles tennis with a 6-3 6-4 win over Leo Borg, the son of Swedish great Bjorn Borg, to reach the last 16 in Bastad as he continues his preparations for the Paris Olympics. content: बाराबंकी जिले में एक बार फिर तेज रफ्तार का कहर देखने को मिला है। यहां फतेहपुर क्षेत्र में एक तेज रफ्तार पिकअप ने सामने से आ रहे दो बाइक सवार युवकों को जोरदार टक्कर मार दी। टक्कर इतनी जबरदस्त थी की बाइक समेत दोनों युवक दूर जा गिरे। जिससे मौके पर ही बा पिकअप इतनी तेज रफ्तार में थी कि हादसे के बाद चालक उसे नियंत्रित नहीं कर पाया, इसके चलते पिकअप बीच रोड पर ही पलट गई। पिकअप पलटने से चालक भी गंभीर रूप से घायल हो गया। बताया जा रहा है कि इलाज के दौरान पिकअप चालक की भी मौत हो गई। घटना बाराबंकी जिले में...

title: ارتفاع تدريجي في درجات الحرارة.. الأرصاد تكشف طقس الأيام المقبلة
content: كتب-عمرو صالح: كشفت الهيئة العامة للأرصاد الجوية عن حالة الطقس المتوقعة بداية من اليوم الأربعاء، وحتى الإثنين 22 يوليو، وذلك على معظم أنحاء البلاد. وقالت الهيئة في بيانها أنه من المتوقع أن تشهد البلاد بداية من اليوم الأربعاء، ارتفاع تدريجي بدرجات الحرارة كبداية لموجة شديدة الحرارة على أغلب الأنحاء. وأوضحت الهيئة أنه من المتوقع أن تشهد البلاد خلال الفترة ما بين 17 يوليو وحتى 22 يوليو طقس شديد الحرارة رطب نهارا على أغلب الأنحاء حار رطب على السواحل الشمالية مائل للحرارة رطب ليلا...

title: علاج الشخير بالليزر.. نتائج واعدة لتجربة جديدة
content: يُعد الشخير مشكلة شائعة تؤثر على ملايين الأشخاص حول العالم، ويمكن أن يكون مزعجًا للغاية،ولكن قد يكون أيضًا علامة على حالة صحية خطيرة مثل انقطاع التنفس الانسدادي أثناء النوم. ووفقا لما ورد عبر صحيفة ديلي ميل، إن هناك العديد من العلاجات المتاحة للشخير،بما في ذلك العلاج بالليزر. أظهرت دراسة حديثة شملت أكثر من 70 شخصًا يعانون من الشخيرنتائج واعدة لعلاج الليزر Yag. فقد شهد حوالي 70٪ من المشاركين توقف الشخير بعد 3 جلسات من العلاج. وتعتمد هذه التقنية على استخدام ليزر Yag لتسخين الأنسجة...

title: Project 2025: Why this 887-page right-wing manifesto is 'terrifying' Americans
content: Concerns have heightened about the future of American democracy in the aftermath of the release of a radical policy blueprint, Project 2025, by figures close to Donald Trump. Crafted by the hard-right Heritage Foundation, the 887-page manifesto highlights a plan to remodel the federal government in Trump's image, replacing thousands of federal workers with conservative loyalists. The plan pushes policy to the right on various issues, centralizes power in the White House, and aims to restrict...

content: A16-year-old girl was buried neck deep and was trapped beneath six to eight feet of sand on Tuesday. According to authorities, she was digging a hole when the sand collapsed on her.

title: Mistaken identity! DCI says on Macharia Gaitho's arrest
creator: Cyrus.ombati@radioafricagroup.co.ke (CYRUS OMBATI)
content: The Director of Criminal Investigation Mohamed Amin now says that the arrest of veteran journalist Macharia Gaitho is a case of mistaken identity. Gaitho was arrested on Wednesday morning at Karen Police station. "We are sorry to Gaitho. It was a case of mistaken identity," Amin said. He was with his son when they were cut off by a Subaru as they left home....

content: به گزارش ، سعید یوسف پور اظهار کرد: بر اساس سنجش پارامترهای ذرات معلق، میزان ذرات تا قطر ۲.۵ میکرون ۲۷ و ذرات تا قطر ۱۰ میکرون برابر ۵۸ میکروگرم در متر مکعب است. مدیر کل محیط زیست استان گفت: شاخص کیفیت هوا ۸۰ است. به گفته وی، بر اساس شاخص کیفیت هوا در صورتی که بین صفر تا ۵۰ باشد کیفیت هوا در وضع پاک، ۵۰ تا ۱۰۰ وضع قابل قبول، ۱۰۰ تا ۱۵۰ هوا ناسالم برای گروه‌های حساس (بیماران قلبی، ریوی، سالمندان و کودکان)، ۱۵۰ تا ۲۰۰ ناسالم برای تمام افراد جامعه و ۲۰۰ تا ۳۰۰ بسیار ناسالم خواهد بود.

title: Госкомпании закупили товаров и услуг у малого и среднего бизнеса Калмыкии на 1,6 млрд рублей
content: Закупки госкомпаний у малого и среднего бизнеса Калмыкии за 1 полугодие 2024 года составили 1,6 млрд рублей. При этом количество поставщиков - 258 МСП. По сравнению с аналогичным периодом прошлого года объем закупок вырос на 112%, а число поставщиков - на 84%. Всего по стране общий объем закупок крупнейших заказчиков у малого и среднего бизнеса в рамках 223-ФЗ составил 4,14 трлн рублей. Поставщиками за это время выступили свыше 143 тысяч МСП.

title: Drone trial to deliver mail between Islay and Jura in the Inner Hebrides
creator: Kevin Scott
content: The trial, which runs until 26 July, will see postal workers loading and unloading mail on both sides for the first time. The multirotor drone, which can carry payloads of up to 6kg, is the same one used in Royal Mail’s previous trial in Orkney. It will transport mail that is usually taken via ferry in a Royal Mail van. content: Three days after attempted assassination, Trump shooter remains an elusive enigma BETHEL PARK, Pa. (AP) — Three days after the attempted assassination of Donald Trump, the 20-year-old man who came close to killing the former president remains an enigma. Neighbors describe Thomas Matthew Crooks as an intelligent loner with few friends who left a vanishingly thin social media footprint and no hint of strong political beliefs. Even his cellphone bore few clues after the FBI accessed its contents,...

title: ADB retains India's growth forecast at 7 pc for FY'25
content: New Delhi, Jul 17 (PTI) The Asian Development Bank (ADB) on Wednesday maintained India's GDP growth forecast at 7 per cent for the current financial year, citing that a rebound in agriculture is expected given above-normal monsoon projections. The ADB forecast comes a day after the International Monetary Fund revised upward its GDP growth projections for India to 7 per cent compared to 6.8 per cent projected in April. content: Dubai/Muscat, Jul 17 (PTI) An Indian national was among six people killed in a rare shooting attack by Islamic State militant group near a Shia Muslim mosque in Oman's capital. content: Онлайн-кинотеатр «Кинопоиск» сменил руководителя, в базе СПАРК руководителем указан Александр Дунаевский. Внимание на это обратил «Коммерсантъ». title: Sterling rises after higher-than-expected UK services inflation
creator: Reuters
content: LONDON (Reuters) - The pound rose slightly on Wednesday after data showed British headline and services inflation in June were slightly above expectations, though core inflation was in line. British inflation held at 2.0% year on year last month, official data showed on Wednesday, above the 1.9% expected by analysts polled by Reuters. title: AlipayHK開通上海地鐵 港人可用港幣按滙率完成支付
creator: 星島頭條網
content: AlipayHK宣佈用戶即日起可「掃碼」乘搭上海地鐵20條軌道交通線路,當中包括磁懸浮線列車;同時,整個過程可透過AlipayHK以港幣按優惠滙率完成支付。 公司表示,港人可在沒有內地電話號碼的情況下購票,從西九龍前往上海虹橋高鐵站,抵滬後再直接在高鐵站下方轉乘上海地鐵2號線、10號線及17號線,直達上海市區各處景點。 至於前往上海旅遊的本港市民在首次開通AlipayHK App時,只需要在首頁點擊「交通」,揀選「易乘碼」,於右上方切換並選擇「上海」,然後在「上海地鐵Metro大都會乘車碼」選擇「啟動」,按照指引,即可生成二維碼,掃碼入閘即可。 目前正在上海暑期實習的兩名本港大學生Ryan和Abby近日嘗試以AlipayHK乘搭上海地鐵,指過程跟在本港使用AlipayHK搭地鐵幾乎沒有分別。其中Ryan表示,「用一個app完成所有事情,由坐巴士到搭地鐵,消費通、出行通,非常方便」;Abby則指,「我來了上海三日,完全沒有用過現金,在這裡根本不用帶錢包出街,真的做到一部手機走天下」。...

title: Jailed BRS leader K Kavitha hospitalised
content: New Delhi: BRS leader K Kavitha lodged in Tihar jail here in connection with a money laundering case, was taken to Deen Dayal Upadhyay Hospital after she developed some gynaecological problem and high fever on Tuesday, officials said. The 46-year-old Bharat Rashtra Samithi (BRS) leader was brought back to prison after undergoing some tests at the hospital, they said. title: В двух селах Калмыкии обнаружили несанкционированные свалки высокого класса опасности

title: 參山處與中市府推廣谷關觀光 泡湯生態健行還可體驗部落文化
content: 台中市社區文化協進會學童在谷關泡腳,五葉松冰棒。(參山處提供) 〔記者歐素美/台中報導〕交通部觀光署參山國家風景區管理處攜手台中市觀光旅遊局推廣谷關觀光,安排台中市社區文化協進會80名學生、家長與志工到谷關參觀「入關博物館」,認識谷關的歷史、地理與生態資源。 一行人今天在谷關公園的舞台區欣賞泰雅原舞工坊帶來的泰雅族傳統打擊樂表演,到冷泉親親魚泡腳池享受小魚咬腳皮的樂趣,還有體驗南勢部落工藝師的泰雅編織DIY等,恰逢參山處舉辦「仲夏呷冰節」活動,並當場品嘗谷關特有的五葉松冰棒,大小朋友都覺得很新奇有趣。 參山處長曹忠猷表示,4月花蓮地震對谷關交通影響不大,但遊客預期心理嚴重影響到谷關旅遊的意願。參山處與市府積極推廣谷關豐富的新玩法,邀請台中市社區文化協進會學生、家長與志工到谷關體驗,將好吃好玩新玩法介紹給大家。...

title: Shipbuilding giant New Times plots major expansion to cope with $5.7bn container ship order run
creator: Irene Ang
content: China’s New Times is boosting its shipbuilding capacity to accommodate a surge in orders that has seen it seal $5.7bn in new business. Sources said the Jiangsu-based shipyard has secured orders for up to 32 LNG dual-fuel container ship newbuildings to be built at a new dry dock. The first vessel from the new dock is expected to delivered in 2027.

title: New York è ancora la capitale mondiale del denaro
content: Una nuova infografica di Visual Capitalist ha rivelato che New York è la città con il maggior numero di milionari al mondo, con un totale di 345.600. La città è seguita da Londra, con 335.500 milionari, e Tokyo, con 316.700. Il rapporto ha utilizzato i dati di Credit Suisse per determinare il numero di milionari in ciascuna città. title: Fire breaks out at Delhi's popular Gulati restaurant, no one injured
content: NEW DELHI: A fire erupted at the renowned Gulati restaurant, situated at Pandara Road near India Gate in Delhi, on Wednesday. According to officials from the Delhi Fire Services (DFS), no injuries were reported during the incident The DFS official stated the fire broke out at 2.48am in the sitting area of the restaurant and soon spread to the first floor. title: Минэнерго предложило продлить запрет на экспорт бензина
content: Министерство энергетики России предложило продлить запрет экспорта бензина на сентябрь-октябрь, а для непроизводителей топлива – до конца года. Об этом сообщило издание РБК. Ведомство выступило с инициативой в целях поддержания стабильной ситуации осенью. Согласно обращению первого заместителя министра энергетики Павла Сорокина к вице-премьеру Александру Новаку, предлагается продлить действие временного запрета до конца 2024 года, но «фактически на сентябрь и октябрь». title: Stock market today: Asian stocks slip, while Australian index tracks Wall St rally to hit record
creator: Associated Press
content: Asian stocks were mostly lower Wednesday even as investors wagered that the Federal Reserve will come ahead with a cut to interest rates, while Australia’s benchmark hit a new record. U.S. futures were mixed and oil prices were little changed. In Tokyo, the Nikkei 225 index gave up early gains to shed 0.4% to 41,095.23. title: Who is Sheikha Mahra Al Maktoum? 6 details to know about this royal
creator: Sarah Joseph

title: Malaysia Looks to Criminalize Cyberbullying After TikTok User’s Death
creator: Anisah Shukry / Bloomberg
content: he death of a Malaysian TikTok user has prompted the government to look into criminalizing cyberbullying and increasing accountability among internet service providers. title: 傳楊懿珊將任駐美副代表 馬文君:應以台灣利益為考量
content: 周刊報導稱,賴政府內定 民進黨 副秘書長楊懿珊接任駐美副代表, 外交部 待走完人事流程就會對外公布。立法院外交及國防委員會召委 馬文君 表示,駐美人事應該要以台灣利益為重要考量,不希望只是唯命是從的對象。 周刊報導指稱,楊懿珊擁有國際、外交專業,畢業於英國倫敦大學皇家哈洛威學院國際關係碩士,更是外交部長林佳龍多年倚重的核心幕僚,賴清德總統去年接任民進黨主席,獲延攬出任黨副秘書長,可見深獲賴、林雙重信任。 對於這項可能的外交人事案,馬文君說,她目前沒有聽到這樣的訊息,不過顯然美國前總統、共和黨總統候選人川普當選的機率還蠻高的,對於駐美的人事,要以台灣的利益為重要考量。 馬文君提到,川普針對台灣議題發表了一些談話,顯然未來台美關係或未來發展,有很多面向必須要增加非常多的付出,不希望出去的都只是唯命是從的對象,應該要以台美發展或台灣利益做為出發點,才有辦法讓台灣更好,而且有時候也要據理力爭,該談判就要談判。 國民黨立委羅智強表示,民進黨任何人事任命,尤其外交部分,基本上都是偏政治任命,這麼多年早就打破外交文官體系,現在只是賴清德希望能夠直接控制、掌握對美的整個狀況。

title: 特朗普若对中国商品征收60%的关税将如何影响全球经济?
content: 唐纳德·特朗普在星条旗背景下紧握拳头、满脸鲜血的形象,或许是他竞选活动的决定性形象,也是我们这个时代的永恒写照。 但是,如果他成为总统,那么他留给世界的将是为他长期以来针对世界各国尤其是中国加强贸易战的野心付出的代价。 虽然尚未引起太多关注,但特朗普第二任政府正威胁要进行一场高风险的赌博,通过在美国的制造业基地周围筑起高墙来重振美国经济。 对于一个几乎被债务淹没的国家来说——其中大部分是在他的第一任期内积累起来的——失误的可能性是巨大的,他有可能造成新一轮危险的通货膨胀。 特朗普的权力基础扎根于心怀不满、基本被遗忘的美国工业中心地带,那些被突如其来的全球化转向抛在后面的人。 这位前总统的伟大计划是让美国回到过去某个不确定的时代,那时美国的工业实力使其成为一股不可忽视的力量。 为了实现这一目标,他计划在贸易问题上让时间倒流。 他在第一任期内就尝试了这一做法,对各国征收关税以保护美国钢铁和铝产品,并对一系列中国商品征收10%的关税。 这一次,如果他能入主白宫,他计划步子迈得更大,对所有进口商品全面征收10%的关税,对中国商品征收高达60%的关税。...

title: 足球》涉嫌集體性侵東京30歲女子 23歲日本國腳被當場逮捕
content: 現年23歲的日本國腳佐野海舟。(資料照,法新社) 〔即時新聞/綜合報導〕現年23歲的日本國腳佐野海舟,本月初宣布以250萬歐元(約新台幣8687萬元),從日本職業足球聯盟(J聯盟)鹿島鹿角隊,成功轉會至德國甲級聯賽美茵茲05(Mainz 05)。然而佐野海舟卻在今(17)日傳出,他涉嫌夥同2名友人,在飯店性侵一名30多歲女子,目前已遭警方逮捕。 綜合日媒報導,根據警方調查顯示,這起事件發生在14日凌晨4點左右,佐野海舟與2名20多歲的友人,先是一起到東京都文京區湯島的某間飯店飲酒,並在之後集體性侵一名30多歲女子。搜查關係人士透露,受害女子的一位女性友人,和被逮捕的3人認識,5人於13日晚間在六本木一同聯誼後,前往飯店續攤。 請繼續往下閱讀... 警方表示,女子在事發後立即撥打110報警,警方迅速趕到現場,並在飯店外將3名嫌犯涉案嫌犯逮捕,罪名是涉嫌未經同意的性交。報導指出,警方目前尚未公布佐野海舟等3人的認罪與否,正在進一步調查事件的詳細經過。...

title: Elephant population in Kerala declines by 7%, highest drop in Wayanad
content: There has been a near 7 per cent decrease in the wild elephant population in Kerala. While the elephant population is stable in Periyar and Nilambur elephant reserves (ERs), the elephant population in the other two ERs, namely Wayanad and Anamudi, has shown a noticeable decline. If in Nilambur the decline is 12 per cent, it is 29 per cent in Wayanad. title: Sardar 2 Shooting Spot Accident: நடிகர் கார்த்திக்கின் சர்தார் 2 படப்பிடிப்பு தலத்தில் சோகம்; சண்டைப்பயிற்சிக்கலைஞர் பலி.!
content: சென்னையில் உள்ள புதுவண்ணாரப்பேட்டை பகுதியை சேர்ந்தவர் ஏழுமலை (வயது 57). இவர் திரைப்பட சண்டைப்பயிற்சி கலைஞர் ஆவார். தற்போது நடிகர் கார்த்திக்கின் சர்தார் 2 படத்தில், சண்டைப்பயிற்சி கலைஞராக பணியாற்றி வந்துள்ளார். இப்படத்தின் சண்டைக் காட்சிகள் சார்ந்த படப்பிடிப்பு நடைபெற்று வரும் நிலையில், எல்.வி பிரசாத் லேப் ஸ்டுடியோவில் அவை நடைபெற்றுள்ளன. இந்நிலையில், நேற்று நடந்த சண்டைக் காட்சிகள் படமாக்களின் (Sardar 2 Shooting Accident) போது, ஏழுமலை எந்த விதமான பாதுகாப்பு உபகரணமும் இன்றி 20 அடி உயரத்தில்...

title: Poslanici PES-a predali predlog zakona: Za razvojnu banku treba 90...
content: Klub poslanika Pokreta Evropa sad predao je u skupštinsku proceduru Predlog zakona o razvojnoj banci kojim je definisano da ona preuzme sve poslove, imovine i zaposlene Investiciono-razvojnog fonda (IRF) koji će biti ugašen čim se banka upiše u Centralni registar privrednih subjekata. Ovo je jedan od krupnih ekonomskih predloga zakona koji ako se usvoji stupiće na snagu mimo javne rasprave. title: At least five killed in gold mine collapse in northern Kenya
content: ISIOLO, Kenya (Reuters) - At least five people were killed and several others injured when an informal gold mine caved in and buried them alive in northern Kenya, a local official said. Authorities closed the Hillo subsistence gold mine near the Ethiopian border in March after several people were killed in clashes between local communities over access to the area, but miners have continued to dig at the site. Around 1,000 people overpowered security forces and invaded the area on Monday...

title: Inflation holds steady at 2% in year to June
content: UK inflation held steady at the Bank of England's target of 2% in June, with prices rising at their slowest rate in nearly three years. Prices rose at 2% in the year to June, unchanged from May and partly driven by hotel prices going up, according to the latest official figures . But price increases in areas such as services, which include everything from restaurants to hairdressers, remain persistent. That could raise questions for Bank of England policy-makers over when they may be planning...

title: Britse inflatie blijft op 2% maar onderliggende prijsdruk blijft sterk

Economen gepolst door Reuters hadden overwegend verwacht dat de inflatie van de consumentenprijzen in de 12 maanden tot juni zou afnemen tot 1,9%, waarmee de daling na een piek van 11,1% in oktober 2022 zich zou voortzetten. title: WhatsApp’s new Favourite filter feature and how to use it, explained
creator: Aman Joe

content: Von Andreas Plecko FRANKFURT (Dow Jones)--Der Auftragsbestand der deutschen Industrie ist im Mai gesunken. Verglichen mit dem Vormonat reduzierte er sich um 0,4 Prozent, wie das Statistische Bundesamt (Destatis) mitteilte. Im Vergleich zum Vorjahresmonat lag der Auftragsbestand kalenderbereinigt 5,4 Prozent niedriger. title: Gambia Upholds Its Ban on Female Genital Cutting, Attempts to Becomes First Country in World To Reverse Such Ban
content: Lawmakers in the West African nation of Gambia on Monday rejected a bill that would have overturned a ban on female genital cutting. The attempt to become the first country in the world to reverse such a ban had been closely followed by activists abroad. The vote followed months of heated debate in the largely Muslim nation of less than three million people. Lawmakers effectively killed the bill by rejecting all its clauses and preventing a final vote. The procedure, also called female genital...

title: Russian farmers fight to salvage harvest as major region cuts forecast
content: Under the sweltering sun and in 50oC temperatures, farmers in the Rostov region, Russia's breadbasket, are toiling to salvage a harvest battered by a heatwave, frost and floods. Study reveals brain structure differences in children with conduct disorder
content: Conduct disorder in young people is associated with differences in surface area across much of the brain compared to typically developing children, new research shows. Conduct disorder (CD) is a common, yet under-recognized condition with symptoms including antisocial or aggressive behaviors, such as, fighting, bullying and rule-breaking. It is usually diagnosed in childhood or adolescence and often leads to poor social and mental health outcomes. Unlike more widely recognized disorders such as...

"The Bear," meanwhile, could be in for a familiar feast on the comedy side. content: அமாவாசையன்று எந்த கிரகமும் தோஷம் பெறுவதில்லை. இதன் காரணமாக அமாவாசை திதியில் சில விஷயங்களை மேற்கொண்டால் வெற்றியாக முடியுமென்பர். இறைவழிபாடு, மருந்து உண்ணுதல், நோயாளிகளைக் குளிப்பாட்டுதல் உள்ளிட்ட செயல்களை அமாவாசையன்று துவங்கலாம் என்று சித்த நூல்கள் கூறுகின்றன. எந்தவொரு பரிகாரப் பூஜையாக இருந்தாலும், அமாவாசையன்று செய்தால் நல்ல பலன்கள் கிட்டும். குரு தோஷம், ராகு- கேது தோஷம், சர்ப்ப தோஷம், சனி, செவ்வாய் கிரகங்களால் ஏற்படக்கூடிய தோஷங்கள், களத்திர தோஷம், மாங்கல்ய தோஷம் ஆகியவற்றுக்கு அமாவாசை...

title: 頂高溫工作!工地妹腳底突刺痛 鞋一脫驚「黑一圈」傻眼:熱到融化
content: 正值炎熱的七月,全台連續幾天飆出38度以上 高溫 。一名女網友分享,在工地頂著高溫工作到一半時,發現腳底一陣發燙,沒想到鞋子一脫,驚見腳底被燒出「黑一圈」。 該名網友在臉書社團「爆廢1公社」 分享 ,她在工地作業時,腳底突然感覺一陣燒燙的刺痛感,但礙於當時手邊工作還沒結束,因此不理會繼續工作,直到休息時才發現腳底已經被燙傷,「結果忙到剛剛一看...鞋底融化了」。 從原po貼出的照片中可見,鞋子因承受不了地面高溫,鞋底直接破了一個大洞,更誇張的是,就連腳底也被燙出一圈焦黑,讓她忍不住驚呼「真的太熱了!」。 一名女網友在工地上班時,突然感覺腳底一陣刺痛,沒想到鞋子脫掉後,腳底竟被燒出「黑一圈」。圖擷取自 爆廢1公社網友Xinchen Lin拍攝 文章曝光,網友們傻眼直呼,「再給個兩個黑點,您就是腳底板有三顆痣的托世孫悟空了」、「看照片味道飄出來了」、「好誇張」、「別想太多單純只是髒東西跑進去而已,那麼薄的鞋底冬天也一樣啦」、「辛苦了」。

title: EUREX/DAX-Future im Verlauf leichter
content: FRANKFURT (Dow Jones)--Mit Abschlägen zeigen sich die DAX-Futures am Mittwoch im Handelsverlauf. Der September-Kontrakt notiert gegen 8.00 Uhr um 49,0 Punkte niedriger mit 18.673,0. In den Handel gegangen war er mit 18.712,0. Das Tageshoch liegt bislang bei 18.717,0 und das Tagestief bei 18.660,0 Punkten. Umgesetzt wurden bisher 1.171 Kontrakte. title: Musk to move SpaceX and X HQ over gender-identity law
creator: CONTRIBUTOR
content: JULY 17 – Billionaire Elon Musk has said he will move the headquarters of two of his most high-profile companies, rocket firm SpaceX and social media platform X, out of California to Texas. He cited his opposition to a new Californian state law which bans schools from requiring staff to disclose information about a child’s gender identity – including to parents. “This is the last straw,” he wrote on social media . title: At least five killed in gold mine collapse in northern Kenya
creator: The Straits Times
content: ISIOLO, Kenya - At least five people were killed and several others injured when an informal gold mine caved in and buried them alive in northern Kenya, a local official said. Authorities closed the Hillo subsistence gold mine near the Ethiopian border in March after several people were killed in clashes between local communities over access to the area, but miners have continued to dig at the site. title: Inflation holds firm in blow to hopes for interest rate cuts
creator: Chris Price
content: Mortgage borrowers grappling with high repayments suffered a blow to their hopes for interest rate cuts after inflation held steady at 2pc last month. The consumer prices index (CPI) was unchanged from 2pc in May, according to the Office for National Statistics. Although it remained at its lowest levels since 2021 and at the Bank of England’s target, it was higher than estimates from economists of a drop to 1.9pc. content: Mehsana Weather: હવામાન વિભાગની આગાહી વચ્ચે અસહ્ય ઉકળાટ, તાપમાન પારો 35 ડિગ્રીએ પહોંચી ગયો Monsoon update: હવામાન વિભાગની આગાહી મુજબ ઉત્તર ગુજરાતમાં બુધવારે હળવાથી મધ્યમ વરસાદની શક્યતા છે. જેમાં મહેસાણા, પાટણ અને બનાસકાંઠા જિલ્લામાં વહેલી સવારે અને મોડી સાંજે વરસાદ વરસી શકે છે. ઉત્તર ગુજરાતમાં તાપમાનનો પારો 35 ડિગ્રીએ પહોંચી ગયો છે.

title: 藍委轟綠營拿狼師案政治操作 吳沛憶:藍白、網軍開始替蔣萬安洗白
content: 民進黨立委吳沛憶。(資料照) 莊文仁/核稿編輯 〔即時新聞/綜合報導〕台北市某私立幼兒園園長之子擔任老師卻涉嫌性侵園內女童,檢警在男子電腦查扣600多部性影像,引起譁然,藍營立委卻藉機攻擊綠營立委。對此立委吳沛憶表示,如果以為對她攻擊,就會讓她停下來噤聲,那就大錯特錯。 吳沛憶在臉書PO文表示,毫無意外,徐巧芯、王鴻薇、羅智強出來幫蔣萬安洗白,接著藍白網軍開始在不同平台湧入對她攻擊,國民黨立委最新攻擊已歪樓到「吳沛憶立法委員不好好做,管什麼台北市政府?」 請繼續往下閱讀... 吳沛憶指出,藍白立委不是一直想要調查權查案,遇到藍營首長犯錯,通通改口立委只負責修法,不要管太多。真的不要太好笑,如果你們以為對她攻擊,就會讓她停下來噤聲,那就大錯特錯,她會繼續追查她手邊收到的資料,並且全數轉交給監察委員調查。 吳沛憶直言,已起訴狼師毛畯珅必須被法律嚴懲。而從2022年第一起受害孩童至2023年之間,所有包庇、失職當追究到底,絕不輕放。 不用抽 不用搶 現在用APP看新聞 保證天天中獎 點我下載APP 按我看活動辦法

title: 想引進移工穩供電 勞長給台電2建議「恐怕不是半年內可解決」
content: 經濟部長郭智輝日前拋出,為加強民生用電的妥善率,擬讓 台電 引進移工解決人力缺口問題。 勞動部 長 何佩珊 今接受YahooTV「齊有此理」專訪透露,缺工時代,各部會現在都急著向勞動部「要人」,而她建議台電應向下綁人,透過產學合作延攬技職體系人才,另一是改善承攬的低勞動條件處境,才能吸引人才。 何佩珊透露,郭智輝有跟她討論,也笑著說在她擔任行政院副秘書長八年時間,從未聽聞台電有缺工問題,她很肯定郭部長把問題提出來,現在經濟部、勞動部已經建立工作對口,討論此事。 她進一步指,台電耗資5000多億的十年電網計畫,這項工程本身其實就可以引進移工,但僅限基層體力工,而郭智輝提及台電所缺人力是具備一定專業技術,必須考取證照,還要有聽從指令的語文能力的中階技術勞工。 何佩珊說,台灣中階技術人才缺口大,除了少子化因素,也是教改以來技職體系長年被忽略所致,這是嚴重的結構性問題,愈來愈少人就讀技職學校。...

title: 600 पोस्ट, 25 हजार युवा... मुंबई में एयरपोर्ट लोडर की नौकरी पाने के लिए उमड़ी बेरोजगारों की भीड़, मची भगदड़
content: मुंबई: एयरपोर्ट पर एयर इंडिया में एयरपोर्ट लोडर की नौकरी के लिए भारी भीड़ उमड़ पड़ी। 600 पदों के लिए 25,000 से ज्यादा लोग इंटरव्यू के लिए पहुंच गए। एयर इंडिया के कर्मचारियों को इतनी बड़ी भीड़ को संभालने में काफी मशक्कत करनी पड़ी। इस घटना की वजह से भगदड़ जैसी स्थिति पैदा हो गई। इस घटना के वीडियो सोशल मीडिया पर वायरल हो रहे हैं, जिनमें लोग नौकरी के लिए आवेदन जमा करने के लिए एक-दूसरे से धक्का-मुक्की करते दिखाई दे रहे हैं। इस घटना के बाद बेरोजगारी को लेकर सवाल उठ रहे हैं और कांग्रेस नेता बीजेपी पर...

title: Uttarakhand Weather: पहाड़ी से गिरा मलबा, पौड़ी हाईवे बाधित, सिद्धबली और दुगड्डा बैरियर किए गए बंद...तस्वीरें
creator: अमर उजाला ब्यूरो, देहरादून
content: पहाड़ी से भारी मलबा गिरने से पौड़ी हाईवे बाधित हो गया। भारी बारिश को देखते हुए सिद्धबली और दुगड्डा बैरियर क्लोज कर दिए गए हैं। प्रदेश के कुमाऊं क्षेत्र में आज बुधवार को भारी से भारी बारिश होने की संभावना है। आज बुधवार सुबह पौड़ी हाईवे पर दुर्गा मंदिर के पास पहाड़ से मलबा आने के कारण हाईवे बाधित हो गया है। मौसम विज्ञान केंद्र की ओर से कुमाऊं के पिथौरागढ़ और बागेश्वर जिले में भारी से भारी बारिश का ऑरेंज अलर्ट जारी किया गया है।

title: گزینه پرسپولیس سرمربی کویت شد
content: تیم ملی فوتبال کویت سرمربی جدید خود را انتخاب کرد. فدراسیون فوتبال کویت رسما از انتخاب خوان آنتونیو پیتسی به عنوان سرمربی جدید تیم ملی فوتبال این کشور خبر داد تا او سکان هدایت تیم را در انتخابی جام جهانی ۲۰۲۶ برعهده بگیرد. پیتسی یکی از گزینه‌های هدایت پرسپولیس برای جایگزینی اوسمار بود که البته سرخ پوشان در نهایت گاریدو اسپانیایی را به عنوان سرمربی جدید خود انتخاب کردند.

title: Bird flu closes in on Australia

title: Сийярто: второй раунд конференции по Украине может пройти уже в этом году
creator: RT на русском
content: Об этом пишет РИА Новости. По его словам, прилагаются усилия для проведения следующего раунда мирной конференции уже в 2024 году, что в Будапеште «приветствовали бы и ценили». Сийярто также отметил большой вклад Швейцарии в организацию конференции. Он добавил, что на конференции должны быть представлены обе стороны, чтобы она была успешной.

Un groupe sud-africain envisage de produire de l'ammoniac et de l'hydrogène verts
content: La compagnie compte en fournir aux pays européens, mais aussi au Japon et à la Corée du Sud. Plusieurs investisseurs de ces pays sont intéressés par le projet, affirme le directeur général du groupe. Selon Colin Loubser, Hive Hydrogen South Africa a déjà commencé à produire des turbines à ammoniac. Le groupe prévoit de lancer 3,6 GW de production d’énergie renouvelable en Afrique du Sud. La réalisation du projet débutera en 2026.

title: SALUD: Basura, vertederos y salud
content: Si la acumulación irregular de basura o desechos sólidos no fuera un peligro para la salud y la vida de las personas, yo no invirtiera un solo segundo de mi tiempo para tratar el tema. Pero sucede que no es así. Los basureros irregulares y los vertederos improvisados son fuente permanente de contaminación ambiental y hospedero de insectos y roedores que se convierten en vectores para la transmisión a niños y adultos de virus, bacterias, parásitos, hongos y otros patógenos. content: ഇക്കഴിഞ്ഞ ജൂലൈ 13-നായിരുന്നു അമേരിക്കൻ മുൻ പ്രസിഡൻറ് ഡോണൾഡ് ട്രംപിന് നേരെ വധശ്രമം നടന്നത്. പെൻസിൽവാനിയയിലെ ബട്ട്‌ലറിൽ നടന്ന തിരഞ്ഞെടുപ്പ് റാലിക്കിടെയായിരുന്നു വെടിവയ്പ്പ്. ട്രംപിന്റെ വലതു ചെവിയുടെ മുകൾഭാഗത്തായാണ് വെടിയേറ്റത്. അക്രമിയെ സുരക്ഷാ ഉദ്യോഗസ്ഥർ വധിക്കുകയും ചെയ്തു. എന്നാൽ, ട്രംപിനെ വധിക്കാൻ ശ്രമിച്ച ആളുടേതെന്ന തരത്തിൽ ഒരു ചിത്രം സമൂഹമാധ്യമമായ എക്‌സിൽ പ്രചരിക്കുന്നുണ്ട്. 'പെൻസിൽവാനിയ സ്വദേശി ഹാങ്ക് പെക്കർ എന്ന മുപ്പത്തിരണ്ടുകാരനാണ് ട്രംപിനെ വധിക്കാൻ ശ്രമിച്ചത്' എന്നാണ് അവകാശവാദം....

title: 阿曼首都清真寺恐攻釀9死 伊斯蘭國宣稱犯案
content: 阿曼首都馬斯開特1座清真寺附近15日發生槍擊案,造成至少9人喪生。(法新社) 郭顏慧/核稿編輯 〔即時新聞/綜合報導〕阿曼首都馬斯開特(Muscat)1座清真寺附近15日發生槍擊案,造成至少9人喪生,包括3名槍手。聖戰組織「伊斯蘭國」(Islamic State)16日宣稱犯案。 綜合媒體報導,15日的攻擊事件在遜尼派穆斯林主導的富裕海灣國家阿曼並不常見,外界憂心2017年被美國為首聯軍擊潰的伊斯蘭國,可能試圖東山再起。 請繼續往下閱讀... 根據伊斯蘭國聲明,「昨晚,3名來自『伊斯蘭國』的自殺攻擊者,攻擊了一群什葉派(穆斯林),其正參與(阿曼)首都阿爾瓦迪阿爾卡比爾(Al-Wadi Al-Kabir)地區1座清真寺的年度儀式。」 聲明補充,伊斯蘭國武裝分子朝什葉派信徒開火後,隨即與阿曼安全部隊交戰,直到早上。 伊斯蘭國16日晚間在應用程式Telegram發布據稱是攻擊事件的影片。伊斯蘭國還表示,這起攻擊導致30多名什葉派穆斯林和5名阿曼軍人死傷,其中包括1名警察。 阿曼經常在區域衝突中,擔任調解人的角色。 不用抽 不用搶 現在用APP看新聞 保證天天中獎 點我下載APP...

title: JEDNA ŠETI STRUJU, DOK DRUGA NE MARI ZA VAŠ NOVČANIK Znate li koja je razlika između inverter i obične klime?
content: Inverter klima i obična klima rade na sličnom principu - hlade i suše vazduh u prostoriji, ali bitna razlika je u načinu kako regulišu temperaturu i kako troše energiju. Obična klima se uključuje kada temperatura u prostoriji poraste iznad određene postavljene vrednosti i isključuje se kad temperatura padne ispod nje. Ovaj proces može dovesti do veće potrošnje energije i varijacija u temperaturi u prostoriji. Shutterstock Inverterski klima uređaji koriste tehnologiju inverterskog...

title: 카이스트·네이버, 대형언어모델의 상품 추천 성능 42% 제고
content: 협업 필터링 원리. 카이스트 제공 한국과학기술원(KAIST)은 산업및시스템공학과 박찬영 교수 연구팀이 네이버와 공동으로 '협업 필터링'(Collaborative filtering)을 통해 대형언어모델(LLM)의 상품 추천 성능을 획기적으로 높일 수 있는 기술을 개발했다고 17일 밝혔다. LLM은 챗GPT와 같이 사람의 개입 없이 임무를 수행할 수 있는 생성형 AI의 기반이 되는 기술이다. 최근 전자상거래 플랫폼 등에서 LLM을 이용한 상품 추천 서비스가...

title: ಮೂತ್ರನಾಳದ ಸೋಂಕಿನಿಂದ ಬಳಲುತ್ತಿದ್ದೀರಾ? ಈ ಸಮಸ್ಯೆಗೆ ಪರಿಹಾರ ಈ ಮನೆಮದ್ದುಗಳಲ್ಲಿದೆ ನೋಡಿ!
content: ಮೂತ್ರದ ಸೋಂಕು ಅಥವಾ ಯೂರಿನರಿ ಟ್ರ್ಯಾಕ್ ಇನ್ಫೆಕ್ಷನ್ (UTI) ಇತ್ತೀಚೆಗೆ ಸಾಮಾನ್ಯ ಆರೋಗ್ಯ ಸಮಸ್ಯೆ (Health Problem) ಆಗಿದೆ. ವಿಶೇಷವಾಗಿ ಮಹಿಳೆಯರನ್ನು (Women) ಈ ಸಮಸ್ಯೆ ಹೆಚ್ಚಾಗಿ ಕಾಡುತ್ತಿದೆ. ಇಂತಹ ಸೋಂಕಿನ ಬಗ್ಗೆ ನಾವು ಸರಿಯಾಗಿ ಕಾಳಜಿವಹಿಸದಿದ್ದರೆ, ಅವು ಮರುಕಳಿಸಬಹುದು. ಹಾಗಾದರೆ ಪದೇ ಪದೇ ಮೂತ್ರನಾಳದ ಸೋಂಕಿನ ಸಮಸ್ಯೆ (Urinary tract infection Problem) ಉಂಟಾಗಲು ಕೆಲವು ಕಾರಣಗಳೆನು ಮತ್ತು ಅವುಗಳನ್ನು ತಡೆಯುವುದು ಹೇಗೆ ಎಂದು ನಾವಿಂದು ತಿಳಿಯೋಣ. ಮೂತ್ರನಾಳದ ಸೋಂಕಿಗೆ ಕೆಲವು ಸಾಮಾನ್ಯ ಕಾರಣಗಳು ಮೂತ್ರನಾಳದ ಸೋಂಕನ್ನು ತಡೆಗಟ್ಟಲು ಸಹಾಯ ಮಾಡುವ ಕೆಲವು ತಂತ್ರಗಳು...

title: UK inflation holds at 2% but underlying price pressures stay strong
creator: Reuters
content: LONDON (Reuters) -British inflation held at 2.0% last month, defying forecasts for a slight fall, and underlying price pressures persisted, maintaining uncertainty about the date of the Bank of England's first interest rate cut since 2020. Economists polled by Reuters had mostly expected headline consumer price inflation would ease to 1.9% in the 12 months to June, extending its drop from a peak of 11.1% in October 2022. Inflation for services was much stronger at 5.7%, the Office for National...

content: ഇവിടെ പോസ്റ്റു ചെയ്യുന്ന അഭിപ്രായങ്ങൾ മലയാള മനോരമയുടേതല്ല. അഭിപ്രായങ്ങളുടെ പൂർണ ഉത്തരവാദിത്തം രചയിതാവിനായിരിക്കും. കേന്ദ്ര സർക്കാരിന്റെ ഐടി നയപ്രകാരം വ്യക്തി, സമുദായം, മതം, രാജ്യം എന്നിവയ്ക്കെതിരായി അധിക്ഷേപങ്ങളും അശ്ലീല പദപ്രയോഗങ്ങളും നടത്തുന്നത് ശിക്ഷാർഹമായ കുറ്റമാണ്. ഇത്തരം അഭിപ്രായ പ്രകടനത്തിന് നിയമനടപടി കൈക്കൊള്ളുന്നതാണ്.

content: Доставщика мебели из Реутова жестоко избили во дворе элитного дома. Парень привез заказ для жительницы и заехал на прилегающую территорию через открытый шлагбаум. title: Жаркая погода до +30 сохранится в Нижнем Новгороде
content: По данным сервиса «Яндекс.Погода», в Нижнем Новгороде в среду 17 июля сохранится жаркая погода с переменной облачностью. Утром температура достигнет отметки +25...+26 с юго-западным ветром. Днем воздух прогреется до +29...+30, с северо-западным ветром. К вечеру столбики термометра опустятся до +25...+27, а ночью — до +19...+20 с сохранением северо-западного ветра со скоростью 2-3 м/с.

title: Enhancing Flavor and Health with Cumin, The Small Spice with Big Benefits | ABP LIVE
creator: ABP Live
content: Cumin, often underestimated for its size, holds significant culinary and health benefits, especially when used in Indian cuisine to enhance the flavor of vegetables and lentils. Known for its distinct earthy and slightly peppery taste, cumin seeds (jeera) not only add depth and aroma to dishes but also boost their nutritional value. When cumin seeds are toasted or lightly fried as a tempering (tadka), they release essential oils and compounds that intensify both the taste and color of the food....

title: 邵家輝:帳委會強烈建議當局檢討提供緊急牙科服務做法
content: 立法會政府帳目委員會就審計報告有關「緊急牙科服務和長者牙科護理支援」問題,提交報告書。 帳委會主席邵家輝在立法會大會說,帳委會強烈建議當局,檢討現時提供緊急牙科服務的做法,並探討是否可設定求診者資格,確保資源用得其所。他指出,因疫情及牙醫人手短缺,緊急牙科服務的籌數由2018/19年度的大約4萬個,減至2022/23件度的大約2萬個,衞生署亦在2022年9月實施安排,在服務當日凌晨12時,為市民作初步登記預留籌號,但未能解決有市民長時間排隊輪候的情況。帳委會對有關不理想情況表示極度關注和不滿。 邵家輝說,帳委會歡迎當局在明年與非政府機構合作,以新模式為有經濟困難的弱勢社群,提供緊急牙科服務,逐步將名額增至6萬;衞生署亦在今年內推出線上電子派籌及登記系統,並調整初步登記時間,以改善輪候安排。 至於為長者提供的牙科護理支持,邵家輝表示,帳委會關注參加牙科外展服務計劃的多個非政府機構,服務達標率頗為參差,而關愛基金的長者牙科服務資助項目在2018/19至2022/23年度的實際受惠人數亦較估算為低,強烈建議當局積極與非政府機構及資助項目的推行機構加強溝通,務求令每名有需要的長者可獲提供服務。

title: 台中外埔西瓜因豪雨受損 瓜農可申請現金救助
content: 台中外埔區 西瓜 因6月上旬豪雨受損嚴重,市府會勘確認損害率達現金救助標準,損害率20%以上瓜農, 農業部 公告即日起至7月26日可申請;市府也補助復耕資材每公頃新台幣1萬元。 台中市 農業局今天發布新聞稿,外埔區西瓜在6月中旬為收穫期,外埔氣象測站(C0F9Q0)5月27日至6月6日間降雨日數為8天,累計降水量174.5mm,造成土壤含水量偏高,影響西瓜根系生長,致使正值果實膨大期的果實受損。 農業部16日公告台中市外埔區為辦理西瓜113年6月上旬豪雨農業天然災害現金救助地區,每公頃救助額度為6萬2000元。外埔區種植西瓜損害率達20%以上農民,即日起至7月26日,可向外埔區公所提出申請。 除中央現金救助,中市府依據「台中市農業災害復建補助作業要點」規定,補助復耕資材每公頃1萬元,協助受災農民儘速復耕。

title: Sri Lanka, Pakistan Visits Confirmed As NZ Reveal Packed Summer Schedule
content: New Zealand have confirmed they will host a white-ball series against Sri Lanka and Pakistan this summer, alongside their previously announced ICC World Test Championship series against England at the end of this year. The Kiwis' men's teams revealed their summer schedule on Wednesday, with the sides set to host international matches from the end of November all the way through to the start of April, as per a release by the ICC. title: Venus jams to hip-hop song beamed from Earth at speed of light
content: Listen to Story In a new collaboration between music and space exploration, Nasa has transmitted hip-hop artist Missy Elliott's iconic song "The Rain (Supa Dupa Fly)" to Venus. This is a historic first for the genre in deep space communication. Nasa's Jet Propulsion Laboratory in Southern California used the Deep Space Network (DSN) to beam the song's inspirational message and lyrics towards Venus, Elliott's favourite planet. The transmission, which travelled approximately 158 million miles at...

title: Владимирским многодетным семьям раздают пожарные извещатели
content: Во Владимирской области многодетные семьи бесплатно получают от МЧС пожарные извещатели. Эти устройства реагируют на дым и подают громкий звуковой сигнал. Благодаря этим небольшим гаджетам семья может вовремя отреагировать на возникновение пожара и принять меры для тушения возгорания и эвакуации из помещения. Извещатель устанавливается в жилище самостоятельно. Прибор автономный, для него не нужно прокладывать кабель пожарной сигнализации. На этой неделе сотрудники МЧС вручили пожарные...

title: Teen thought she had trapped wind but vaping had burned hole in her lung
creator: news@hulldailymail.co.uk (Neil Shaw)
content: A 'shocked' teen admits she continued to vape even when it nearly killed her sister - only for her 'trapped wind' to turn out be a hole in her lung too just WEEKS later. Tazmin Blight, who has used c-cigs she was just 13, says she continued to vape the equivalent of 50 cigarettes a day despite her sister Kyla hitting headlines last month for being hospitalised due to them. title: Oil prices steady as declining US inventories offset slowing China demand
creator: none@none.com (Reuters)
content: Oil prices were steady on Wednesday, with global benchmark Brent hovering near the one-month low it hit in the prior session, as signs of weakening demand growth in China clashed with the prospect of declining U.S. oil stockpiles. Brent crude oil futures was down by 4 cents to $83.69 a barrel by 0315 GMT. U.S. West Texas Intermediate crude futures also eased 4 cents to $80.72. title: 'Why am I competing when people in my country are dying?'
content: When Ukrainian climber Jenya Kazbekova was woken at 5am by the sounds of bombs falling outside her home in Kyiv, she barely had time to process that her life was about to change. "It was one of the most horrifying experiences I've ever had in my life," she said. "I woke up, looked at my mum because we shared a bedroom and was like, what was that? What are those sounds? title: Veteran journalist Macharia Gaitho abducted
creator: Brian.Oruta@radioafricagroup.co.ke (BRIAN ORUTA)
content: Veteran Journalist Macharia Gaitho has been abducted by unknown individuals at Karen police station. Gaitho was with his son when were cut off by a Subaru as they left home. He then drove off into Karen Police Station where he was forcefully taken. In a video seen by the Star, the journalist is shoved into a white Probox inside the station by people in civilian clothes as police looked. The video was recorded by his son. More to follow

creator: RT на русском
content: Российские военные в ночь на 17 июля пресекли новые попытки Киева атаковать объекты на российской территории, заявили в Минобороны РФ. Средства ПВО уничтожили в общей сложности пять беспилотников самолётного типа над Белгородской, Брянской и Воронежской областями.
